Together.We design, develop and maintain sustainable digital customer experiences and walk beside our clients on the journey of their digital transformations.Welcome aboard!We are currently looking for Senior Back-end Developer to join our developer community at Knowit Experience and strengthen our teams.Knowit Experience consists of a tight-knit group of over 50 experts, and we specialize in creating high-quality and impactful digital experiences that cater to business needs. We take pride in our role in creating digital experiences, and our work can be seen on websites and web services we have done for our clients such as EQ, Technopolis, Alma Talent, WWF, Events Helsinki, and Porvoo.fi. More of us and our reference cases can be found hereWhat kind of developer and technical competence we are looking for?Our core expertise lies in designing and developing top-notch web services that create excellent customer experiences - and we do this using modern and best practices. This means that you will have the opportunity to work with highly skilled developers and designers, using the latest and regularly updated technologies. We hope that you have a built-in desire to develop and improve yourself, as this is also a significant factor that unites our team.In our project teams, tasks are diverse, and you do not need to be a master of everything, but if your skill set includes some or few of the following areas, you may be the new colleague we are looking for.WordPress PHP & Laravel Integrations on top of WordPress and Laravel architecturesBack-end development for headless architectureThe technical specification work of the project as well as technical leading are your cups of teaYou like to mentor your team membersYou understand DevOps practices and toolsFluent communication skills in English, Finnish is a plusIf you also prefer to have front-end related responsibilities, our teams work quite often with JavaScript based technologies such as React, so you definitely have opportunity to take even stronger role in bringing our wireframes and prototypes to life. Mastering those frameworks makes us smile, but they aren't required.Career wise this could be your opportunity in case you have already holistic hands-on experience and understanding of developing high-quality web service projects.Other buzzwords related to the role and team: Jamstack, Headless CMS, Git, REST, GraphQL, accessibility, Scrum, Serverless, React, Node.jsWhat we offer for you?At Knowit we appreciate versatile and so called generalist expertise from technical point of view, but also deeper expertise from some specific competence area.To ensure that this is not just a one-sided wish list, we want you to have the opportunity to influence your role and take as much responsibility in client projects as you want. We want you to have opportunity to drive your competence development supported by us, whether it will be about newest specific technologies or a longer path in specializing as an expert of your field.You are most welcomed to join our team as yourself, as a complete person. For us, an easy-going and professional work environment is an absolute value, and your team member is always just one slack message away.These are the things we promise you:100% remote work in Finland. Our offices in Kamppi, Tampere, and Turku (Oulu 100% remote) are always open if you want to meet your colleagues F2F, but you still get to decide where in Finland you work from. A team that supports your professional growth. Our teams consist of experts ranging from senior architects to recent graduates and future stars, making it easy for you to to develop yourself and share knowledgeLarge-scale projects for well-known Finnish companies in the field of digital service experiences, which will look great on your CV and challenge you. Extensive personnel benefits such as work equipment according to your preferences, mobile benefit, lunch benefit, commute benefit, recreational benefit, extensive occupational health care, health insurance, bike benefit, recruitment and sales lead bonuses, remote work abroad for short termsCulture that cherishes work and life balanceWe will provide you with trust and responsibility and ensure that you have opportunities to make the very best out of your time with us.Interested?In case you recognized that joining our team of Makers could be the kind of opportunity you'd enjoy, let us hear about you more by sending an application!If you come up with any questions or want to have a quick chat before making any further decisions, just reach out for Talent Acquisition Partner Topias Niinivaara, whose contact information can be found on our career site!

Grow. Make a difference. Together.Me suunnittelemme, rakennamme, testaamme ja ylläpidämme kestäviä digitaalisia palveluita, sekä kuljemme asiakkaidemme rinnalla heidän ketterien digimuutosten matkoillaan.Tervetuloa mukaan!Etsimme nyt Knowit Solutionsin kasvavaan testaus ja laadunvarmistus -yhteisöömme Suorituskykyasiantuntijoita vahvistamaan tiimejämme.Roolisi ja tiimisi työ Automation & QA -yksikössämme rakentuu asiakkaidemme bisneskriittisten digitaalisten palveluiden suorituskyvyn ja niiden varmistamisen ympärille. Iso viipale viimeisen päälle laadukasta ohjelmistoa on sen kyky kestää kuormitusta, ja että mylly pyörii tasaisella varmuudella myös julkaisun sekä päivityksien jälkeen. Me Knowitilla olemme ylpeitä asiantuntijuudestamme sekä roolistamme asiakkaidemme liiketoiminnalle tärkeiden sovelluksien laadukkuuden varmistamisessa ja kehittämisessä. Olemme ISTQB:n platinakumppani ja johtava kouluttaja ketterän kehityksen, testauksen, automaation ja DevOpsin alueilla.Minkälaista Suorituskykyasiantuntijaa ja tiimikaveria etsimme?Jaat meidän kiinnostuksemme ja ammattitaitomme sekä -ylpeytemme ensiluokkaisen ohjelmistojen suorituskykytestauksen äärellä.Osaavien ja lahjakkaiden ammattilaisten kanssa työskentely on sinulle tärkeää. Automaation, testauksen ja laadunvarmistuksen suhteen meiltä löytyy alan kovinta osaamista ja sen myötä - yhtään nöyristelemättä - erittäin hyvät mahdollisuudet kehittää ja ylläpitää työmarkkinan tarpeita vastaavaa ammattiosaamistasi. Minkälaista teknistä kompetenssia toivomme sinulta?Meidän tiimissä tehtävät ovat monipuolisia, ja kaikessa ei luonnollisestikaan tarvitse olla mestari, mutta jos sinun työkalupakistasi löytyy osaamista tai taustaa joltain seuraavista osa-alueista, niin saatat olla etsimämme uusi työkaveri.Suorituskykytestausprojektien suunnittelu ja läpivientiLoadRunner tai JMeter -työkalutKuormitustestausprojekteihin liittyvä raportointi ja analysointiKyky tunnistaa ohjelmistojen ja sovelluksien suorituskykyyn liittyviä pullonkauloja ja haasteitaHyvät ongelmanratkaisutaidotAsiakasprojekteistamme johtuen toivomme myös sinun olevan mukavuusalueellasi jos työkielenä on sekä suomi, että englanti. Uramielessä tämä voisi olla sinun tilaisuutesi, jos sinulla on jo muutaman vuoden verran hands-on taustaa sekä näkemystä vaativista suorituskykyprojekteista ja laadunvarmistuksen tehtävistä.Muita buzzwordeja roolin ja tiimin ympäriltä: Automation, Quality Assurance, Performance Testing, Load TestingMitä tarjoamme sinulle?Me Knowitilla arvostamme monipuolista ja niin kutsuttua generalisti -osaamista teknisessä mielessä, mutta samalla myös syvempää osaamista joltain spesifiltä osaamisalueelta.Jotta tämä ei olisi myöskään vain yksipuolinen toivomuslista, niin haluamme, että sinulla on asiantuntijana mahdollisuus vaikuttaa rooliisi ja ottaa vastuuta kehittymisestäsi meidän tukemana, liittyi se sitten yksittäisiin uusimpiin teknologioihin tai pidempään polkuun alan erityisasiantuntijana profiloitumiseen.Meille jokainen saa tulla omana kokonaisena itsenään, meillä rento ja ammattimainen työyhteisö on itseisarvo, ja tiimikaveri on aina vähintään yhden slack-viestin päässä, jos hän ei satu istumaan viereisellä työpisteellä. Projektitiimimme työskentelevät usein asiakkaidemme toimitiloissa, minkä lisäksi tarjoamme modernit toimitilat Helsingin keskustassa. Näköalapaikkoja emme keskustan tiheän rakennuskannan vuoksi tohdi luvata, mutta uskallamme sanoa projektien ja tiimin olevan sen verran mainiot, että mieluummin niiden parissa päivänsä viettää kuin tuijottelisi ikkunasta ulos. Helsingin lisäksi meillä on toimistot myös Tampereella, Turussa sekä Oulussa.Tarjoamme sinulle totta kai myös kattavat työssäsi viihtymistä sekä hyvinvoinnistasi huolehtimista tukevat henkilöstöedut, joustavan työajan, erinomaisen työn ja vapaa-ajan balanssin, sekä laajat mahdollisuudet osaamisen kehittämiseen ja urasi boostaamiseen.Meiltä saat luottamusta ja vastuuta, ja teemme parhaamme, että sinulla on toiveisiisi istuvat ammatilliset mahdollisuudet onnistua tiimissämme.Kiinnostuitko?Oletko sinä kenties seuraava Makerimme? Jos yllä oleva kuvaus osui yksiin sinun ammatillisten mielenkiinnon kohteittesi kanssa, ja voisit nähdä itsesi meidän riveissämme, niin me haluamme ehdottomasti kuulla sinusta lisää!Jos jokin jäi vielä mietityttämään tai haluat kuulla roolista tai meistä lisää, niin voit olla yhteydessä Talent Acquisition Partneriimme Sebastianiin, löydät hänen yhteystietonsa alta.Toivottavasti kuulemme sinusta pian!

Together.We design, develop and maintain sustainable digital solutions and walk beside our clients on the journey of their agile digital transformations.Welcome aboard!When it comes to expertise in Optimizely, its solutions and possibilities, our humble objective is to be and remain among the very best out there. We already have great talent in the house recognized by the Optimizely community, and as our ambition level is high, we'd like to welcome more - hence we are now looking for Senior Back-end Developers (.NET, Optimizely) to join and strengthen our developer community in Knowit Experience.Your and the team's work in our Experience Unit focuses on designing, developing and maintaining impressive and appealing digital customer experiences and digital solutions. We are proud of our role within creating memorable digital experiences, and our developers' hand prints are shown in the web services and sites we have done for clients such as WWF, Business Finland, Amos Rex, Visit Finland, HSY, The Finnish Association for Nature Conservation, Design Forum Finland and Mandatum Life.What kind of developer and technical competence we are looking for?Primarily we are looking for experienced .NET developers, who share our interest and expertise around first-class digital services and technical implementation of digital customer experiences. In our team you get your hands on versatile and remarkable B2B and B2C client projects with extremely talented professionals who are also simply great to work with. We wish you have that built-in willingness to hone your skills and expertise as that is one major factor our people have in common.Concerning the responsibilities we hope you have strong understanding and craftsmanship developing high-quality technical implementations which are at same time visually appealing and accessible. In technical picture, your team works with Optimizely platforms and related integrations with .NET based technologies - and even though our roles are versatile, you don't necessarily need to be master in every area. However, in case your professional tool-box includes skills in for instance following areas, you might be the kind of new co-worker we are looking for..NET CoreASP.NET MVCOptimizelyModern version control tooling (Git)You understand DevOps practices and toolsThe technical specification work of the project as well as technical leading are your cups of teaOur team works with agile methods, so practical understanding about them in the context of software development is necessary to jump in to the teamFluent communication skills in English, Finnish is a plusIf you also prefer to have front-end related responsibilities, our teams work quite often with JavaScript based technologies such as React.js and Vue.js, so you definitely have opportunity to take even stronger role in bringing our wireframes and prototypes to life. Mastering those frameworks makes us smile, but they aren't required.Career wise this could be your opportunity in case you have already holistic hands-on experience and understanding of developing and possibly leading high-quality web service projects.Other buzzwords related to the role and team: .NET Framework, Sitecore, Sitefinity, Umbraco, accessibility, ScrumWhat we offer for you?At Knowit we appreciate versatile and so called generalist expertise from technical point of view, but also deeper expertise from some specific competence area.We don't want this to be only a one-sided wish list. Hence, we want that as a developer, you have opportunities to affect your role and take as much responsibility in client projects you want. We want you to have opportunity to drive your competence development supported by us, whether it will be about newest specific technologies or a longer path in specializing as an expert of your field.You are most welcomed to join our team as yourself, as a complete person. For us, an easy-going and professional work environment is an absolute value, and your team member is always just one slack message away. We have modern offices located in the heart of Helsinki, Tampere, Turku and Oulu, but if you prefer a remote setting, that is completely ok, as the work can be done right where you, your computer and internet connection are. Literal sightseeing locations and vantage points we dare not to promise due to current city infrastructures but we dare to promise that our projects and teams are great enough, so that you rather spend your time with them rather than just looking through the windows.We provide you with extensive personnel benefits to take care of your well-being and to give the appropriate chances to succeed in your work. Moreover, we have culture that cherishes work and life balance and wide variety of opportunities to develop yourself.We will provide you with trust and responsibility and ensure that you have opportunities to make the very best out of your time with us.Interested?In case you recognized that joining our team of Makers could be the kind of opportunity you'd enjoy, let us hear about you more by sending an application!If you come up with any questions or want to have a quick chat before making any further decisions, just reach out for Talent Acquisition Partner Topias Niinivaara, whose contact information can be found on our career site!

Meille jokainen saa tulla omana kokonaisena itsenään, ja meillä rento sekä ammattimainen työyhteisö on itseisarvo.Nämä tarjoamme sinulleTiimin ja yhteisön, jossa on helppo kehittyä ja saada tarvittaessa apua. Meillä on töissä eri uran vaiheilla olevia osaajia, ja tarjoamme mahdollisuuksia, jotka haastavat ja kehittävät sekä vastavalmistuneita tulevaisuuden tekijöitä, että myös kokeneempia ammattilaisia. Sisäisesti meillä paljon kiitellyn People Lead-mallin. Meillä esihenkilön tärkein tehtävä on mahdollistaa, että sinulla on asiantuntijana parhaat edellytykset onnistua työssäsi ja kehittyä ammatillisestiAjan ja resurssit kehittää osaamistasi työajalla (koulutukset, sertifikaatit, kiltatoiminta). Haluamme investoida sinun osaamisesi kehittämiseen. Tiimimalleilla mahdollistettu työrotaatio. Kädenjälkesi on mahdollista näkyä useilla toimialoilla ja erilaisten asiakkuuksien kautta pääset aidosti oppimaan uutta. Teknologiariippumattoman ympäristön. Me teemme töitä moderneilla teknologioilla ja työkaluilla sekä parhailla käytännöillä, minkä lisäksi meillä on vahvat teknologiapartneruudet alan isojen toimijoiden kanssa. Samalla olemme kuitenkin uteliaita ja valmiita oppimaan uutta sekä haastamaan status quon. Eri elämäntilanteissa joustavan etä/hybridityönErinomaisen työn ja vapaan tasapainon - me teemme isoja ja merkityksellisiä projekteja kestävän digitalisaation parissa, mutta jokainen meistä on kokonainen ihminen ja arkeen mahtuu muutakin kuin työMuut kattavat työsuhde-edut (lounas, työmatka, liikunta/kulttuuri, laaja työterveyshuolto, tapaturmavakuutus, polkupyöräetu, työvälineet valinnan mukaan, ergonominen työpiste kotiin, rekry- ja myyntiliidibonukset, mahdollisuus tilapäiseen etätyöskentelyyn ulkomailla, nimetyissä maissa)Meiltä saat luottamusta ja vastuuta, ja teemme parhaamme, että sinulla on toiveisiisi istuvat ammatilliset mahdollisuudet onnistua tiimissämme.Voit tutustua meihin ja työhömme koodin parissa myös artikkelimme "Kaiken takana on koodi" kauttaKiinnostuitko?Jos yllä runoiltu osui yksiin sinun ammatillisten mielenkiinnon kohteidesi kanssa, ja voisit nähdä itsesi meidän riveissämme, niin me haluamme ehdottomasti kuulla sinusta lisää! Me suunnittelemme, rakennamme, testaamme ja ylläpidämme kestäviä digitaalisia palveluita, sekä kuljemme asiakkaidemme rinnalla heidän ketterien digimuutosten matkoillaan.Tervetuloa mukaan!Etsimme nyt Knowit Solutionsin kasvavaan testaus- ja laadunvarmistusyhteisöömme asiantuntijaa Agile Master -tehtävään.Roolisi ja tiimisi työ Automation & Quality -kompetenssialueellamme on vastata sovitun ketterän kehitysmallin noudattamisesta asiakkaidemme bisneskriittisten digitaalisten palveluiden kehitysympäristöissä.. Me Knowitilla olemme ylpeitä asiantuntijuudestamme sekä roolistamme asiakkaidemme liiketoiminnalle tärkeiden sovellusten laadun varmistamisesta ja kehittämisestä. Olemme ISTQB:n platinakumppani ja johtava kouluttaja ketterän kehityksen, testauksen, automaation ja DevOpsin alueilla.Minkälaista Agile Masteria ja tiimikaveria etsimme?Olet hankkinut aiempaa kokemusta haasteellisten kehityshankkeiden ja/tai projektien läpiviennistä kompleksisissa järjestelmäympäristöissäSinulla on kokemusta projektien/hankkeiden hallinnasta, jotka sisältävät sekä liiketoiminnallista työtä että järjestelmäkehitystäTyöskentelet niin itseohjautuvasti kuin myös tiimin jäsenenäToimit luontaisesti fasilitaattorina ja huolehdit positiivisesta ryhmädynamiikastaOmaat hyvän stressinsietokyvynAutomaation, testauksen ja laadunvarmistuksen suhteen meiltä löytyy alan kovinta osaamista ja sen myötä - yhtään nöyristelemättä - erinomaiset mahdollisuudet kehittää ja ylläpitää työmarkkinan tarpeita vastaavaa ammattiosaamistasi.Minkälaista teknistä kompetenssia ja kokemusta toivomme sinulta?Agile Master -tehtävässä pärjää hyvin, jos työkalupakistasi löytyy seuraavanlaista osaamista:Kokemusta toiminnasta vahvasti säännellyssä ympäristöissäVahvaa osaamista riskien, riippuvuuksien ja sidosryhmätyön hallintaanJira ja Confluence osaamistaAsiakasprojekteissamme verkostoituminen ja hyvät kommunikointi- sekä yhteistyötaidot auttavat sinua onnistumaan tehtävässäsi. Työkielenä on sekä suomi että englanti.Muita buzzwordeja roolin ja tiimin ympäriltä: Automation, Quality Assurance, test automation, Windows, LinuxMiksi Knowit?Meille jokainen saa tulla omana itsenään, meillä rento ja ammattimainen työyhteisö on itseisarvo, ja tiimikaveri on aina vähintään yhden Slack-viestin päässä. Meillä on modernit toimitilat Kampissa, Helsingin keskustassa. Helsingin lisäksi meillä on toimistot myös Tampereella, Turussa sekä Oulussa.Nämä tarjoamme sinulle:Ajan ja resurssit kehittää osaamistasi työajalla (koulutukset, sertifikaatit ja kiltatoiminta). Haluamme panostaa työntekijöidemme osaamisen kehittämiseen.Eri elämäntilanteissa joustavan etä/hybridityönMahdollisuuden tilapäiseen etätyöhön ulkomailla (Espanja, Italia, Kreikka, Portugali ja Saksa)Kattavat työsuhde-edut (lounas, liikunta/kulttuuri, laaja työterveyshuolto, laaja sairausvakuutus kattaen lääkkeet ja vapaa-ajan tapaturmat, polkupyöräetu, työmatka)Työvälineet oman toiveen mukaan (HP/MAC)Ergonomisen etätyöpisteen kotiin (sisältäen internet yhteyden)Moderni kuntosali Helsingin toimipisteelläKiinnostuitko?Jos yllä runoiltu osui yksiin sinun ammatillisten mielenkiinnon kohteidesi kanssa, ja voisit nähdä itsesi meidän riveissämme, niin me haluamme ehdottomasti kuulla sinusta lisää!

Grow. Make a difference. Together.We help our clients to understand why cloud services will support their growth and how to begin their sustainable cloud journey. Our strong Azure cloud expertise, together with our highest-level partnership with Microsoft Azure, enables us to act as a long-term and trusted partner for our clients, accelerating their cloud journey in a secure, efficient and cost-optimised way.Now we want to strengthen our Azure cloud professionals team and invite you to join Makers of sustainable future! Sustainability is one of our key principles and for example, we have partnered with the Exponential Roadmap Initiative and joined Race to Zero and signed Microsoft's Partner Pledge.As an Architect or Specialist, you will build, implement, maintain and develop further new, and sustainable cloud services for a wide range of different kind of clients. Our clientele includes significant organizations such as Valmet, S Group, Paulig and Varma.How is this role like - what are the pros?As an Azure professional at Knowit; you will have all the chances to utilize your capabilities and skills with modern and the newest Azure technologies, try new things and choose your path to develop professional skills to the wanted direction. Cloud platforms develop rapidly and we want to ensure that you are able to keep your skills up to date thus our Specialists and Architects are able to utilize substantial part of their working time for competence development. Cloud certifications are paid by Knowit.Building service entities based on Microsoft Azure cloud architectures takes shape from definition to design, and all the way to development and deployment. You'll be a part of client team(s) surrounded by other skilled Azure experts working together in the core of both technology and our clients' business. What are the options, nuances and requirements in this role?As an Azure Architect / Specialist, you are able to communicate fluently with people in different roles in both Finnish and English and have an inherent interest in grasping the technical side of Azure as well. All our Azure professionals' common thing is that they can execute "hands-on" technical work when needed.There are different priorities, in which your core skills may be and we are curious and open to learn your unique path towards Azure. Below aspects and directions of your interest can guide and define your role as an Azure Architect / Specialist in our team:Several years of experience in the traditional IT-infrastructure and also experience in building the Azure cloud services. This means you are interested in planning and designing architectures and/or being the strong builder and executioner of these architectures. Infrastructure as a code (IaC) is our process of choice.DevOps mindset; You understand modern ways of setting things up with native tools and code, and you find ways to automate (from infrastructure to business logic).Code aspect; application development on top of Azure platform. You can understand the code and speak the same language as the software developers, but in case needed, able to do the implementations yourself. What do we offer for you?Extensive benefits (phone, lunch, recreational, commuting and bike), substantial health insurance (inc. leisure time) and phone of your choice (max. 1200 euros inc. optional equipment)Time and materials for competence development and paid certificationsPossibility to choose your Way of working. You can either work from our modern and central offices in Helsinki or Turku, or remotely from home or hybrid. We offer ergonomic and modern equipment according to your Way of working model.Nice and helpful colleagues and healthy balance between work and private time. If you have any questions about the role, please reach out to Talent Acquisition Partner Sofia Hirvonen, name.surname(at)knowit.fi / 040 530 5860.

Grow. Make a difference. Together.Meille Knowitilla toimivat digitaaliset palvelut ovat osa kestävää kehitystä. Siksi myös asiakkaamme niin julkishallinnossa kuin yksityisellä sektorilla luottavat siihen, että kehitämme kestäviä ja innovatiivisia sovelluksia ja järjestelmiä niin julkisiin palveluihin kuin liiketoiminnan kannalta kriittisiin tarpeisiinEtsimme nyt Knowit Solutionsissa C++ -kehittäjiä vahvistamaan sulautettujen järjestelmien ja palvelinohjelmistojen kehityksen parissa työskenteleviä tiimejämme.Minkälaisesta roolista on kyse?C++ -kehittäjänä toimit mm. sulautettujen Linux- ja/tai Windows-pohjaisten järjestelmien ohjelmistokehitystehtävien parissa esimerkiksi konepajateollisuuden ja terveysteknologian asiakkuuksissamme. Voit olla taustaltasi sulautetun softan tai myös palvelinohjelmistojen kehittäjä, ja toivomme sinulta hyviä valmiuksia laadukkaan ja helposti ylläpidettävän koodin kirjoittamiseen, sillä meihin on sisäänrakennettuna ammattiylpeys omaa kädenjälkeämme kohtaan.Ketterin menetelmin toimivissa tiimeissämme tehtävät ovat monipuolisia, ja kaikessa ei luonnollisestikaan tarvitse olla mestari. Jos sinun työkalupakistasi löytyy kuitenkin osaamista esimerkiksi seuraavista osa-alueista, saatat olla etsimämme uusi työkaveri.C++ -ohjelmointi (11 tai uudempi versio)Qt / QMLSoftan versionhallinta (Git) Ketterän ohjelmistokehitysprosessin hallintaTestausosaaminen sekä debuggaus-osaaminen (yksikkötestaus, myös robottitestaus plussaa)Ohjelmiston analysointityökalujen hallintaAsiakasprojekteistamme johtuen toivomme myös sinun olevan mukavuusalueellasi jos työkielenä on sekä suomi että englanti.Muita buzzwordeja roolin ja tiimin ympäriltä: Scrum, Linux, sulautetut järjestelmät, DevOps, CI, ValgrindMiksi Knowit?Me Knowitilla arvostamme monipuolista yleisosaamista, sekä halua ottaa myös uusia osaamisalueita haltuun.Jotta tämä ei olisi pelkästään yksipuolinen toivomuslista, haluamme, että sinulla on devaajana mahdollisuus vaikuttaa rooliisi ja ottaa vastuuta kehittymisestäsi meidän tukemanamme. Meille jokainen saa tulla omana kokonaisena itsenään, ja meillä rento sekä ammattimainen työyhteisö on itseisarvo.Nämä tarjoamme sinulleTiimin ja yhteisön, jossa on helppo kehittyä ja saada tarvittaessa apua. Meillä on töissä eri uran vaiheilla olevia osaajia, ja tarjoamme mahdollisuuksia, jotka haastavat ja kehittävät sekä vastavalmistuneita tulevaisuuden tekijöitä, että myös kokeneempia ammattilaisia. Sisäisesti meillä paljon kiitellyn People Lead-mallin. Meillä esihenkilön tärkein tehtävä on mahdollistaa, että sinulla on asiantuntijana parhaat edellytykset onnistua työssäsi ja kehittyä ammatillisestiAjan ja resurssit kehittää osaamistasi työajalla (koulutukset, sertifikaatit, kiltatoiminta). Haluamme investoida sinun osaamisesi kehittämiseen. Tiimimalleilla mahdollistettu työrotaatio. Kädenjälkesi on mahdollista näkyä useilla toimialoilla ja erilaisten asiakkuuksien kautta pääset aidosti oppimaan uutta. Teknologiariippumattoman ympäristön. Me teemme töitä moderneilla teknologioilla ja työkaluilla sekä parhailla käytännöillä, minkä lisäksi meillä on vahvat teknologiapartneruudet alan isojen toimijoiden kanssa. Samalla olemme kuitenkin uteliaita ja valmiita oppimaan uutta sekä haastamaan status quon. Eri elämäntilanteissa joustavan etä/hybridityönErinomaisen työn ja vapaan tasapainon - me teemme isoja ja merkityksellisiä projekteja kestävän digitalisaation parissa, mutta jokainen meistä on kokonainen ihminen ja arkeen mahtuu muutakin kuin työMuut kattavat työsuhde-edut (lounas, työmatka, liikunta/kulttuuri, laaja työterveyshuolto, tapaturmavakuutus, polkupyöräetu, työvälineet valinnan mukaan, ergonominen työpiste kotiin, rekry- ja myyntiliidibonukset, mahdollisuus tilapäiseen etätyöskentelyyn ulkomailla, nimetyissä maissa)Meiltä saat luottamusta ja vastuuta, ja teemme parhaamme, että sinulla on toiveisiisi istuvat ammatilliset mahdollisuudet onnistua tiimissämme.Voit tutustua meihin ja työhömme koodin parissa myös artikkelimme "Kaiken takana on koodi" kauttaKiinnostuitko?Jos yllä runoiltu osui yksiin sinun ammatillisten mielenkiinnon kohteidesi kanssa, ja voisit nähdä itsesi meidän riveissämme, niin me haluamme ehdottomasti kuulla sinusta lisää! Jos jokin jäi vielä mietityttämään tai haluat kuulla roolista tai meistä lisää, niin voit olla yhteydessä Talent Acquisition Partner Topias Niinivaaraan, etunimi.sukunimi(a)knowit.fi / 050 359 7727.Toivottavasti kuulemme sinusta pian!

Grow. Make a difference. Together.We help our clients to understand why cloud services will support their growth and how to begin their sustainable cloud journey. Our strong AWS cloud expertise, together with our highest-level partnership with AWS, enables us to act as a long-term and trusted partner for our clients, accelerating their cloud journey in a secure, efficient and cost-optimised way.Now we want to strengthen our AWS cloud professionals team and invite you to join Makers of sustainable future! Sustainability is one of our key principles and for example, we are the first in the Nordic market in providing a sustainability-driven cloud offering and have partnered with the Exponential Roadmap Initiative and joined Race to Zero.As an Architect or Specialist, you will build, implement, maintain and develop further new and sustainable cloud services for a wide range of different kind of clients. Our clientele includes significant organizations such as S Group, Paulig, Varma and Valmet.How is this role like - what are the pros?As an AWS professional at Knowit; you will have all the chances to utilize your capabilities and skills with modern and the newest AWS technologies, try new things and choose your path to develop professional skills to the wanted direction. Cloud platforms develop rapidly and we want to ensure that you are able to keep your skills up to date thus our Specialists and Architects are able to utilize substantial part of their working time for competence development. Cloud certifications are paid by Knowit.Building service entities based on AWS cloud architectures takes shape from definition to design, and all the way to development and deployment. You'll be a part of client team(s) surrounded by other skilled AWS experts working together in the core of both technology and our clients' business. What are the options, nuances and requirements in this role?As an AWS Architect / Specialist, you are able to communicate fluently with people in different roles in both Finnish and English and have an inherent interest in grasping the technical side of AWS as well. All our AWS professionals' common thing is that they can execute "hands-on" technical work when needed.There are different priorities, in which your core skills may be and we are curious and open to learn your unique path towards AWS. Below aspects and directions of your interest can guide and define your role as an AWS Architect / Specialist in our team:Several years of experience in the traditional IT-infrastructure and also experience in building the AWS cloud services. This means you are interested in planning and designing architectures and/or being the strong builder and executioner of these architectures. Infrastructure as a code (IaC) is our process of choice.DevOps mindset; You understand modern ways of setting things up with native tools and code, and you find ways to automate (from infrastructure to business logic).Code aspect; application development on top of AWS platform. You can understand the code and speak the same language as the software developers, but in case needed, able to do the implementations yourself. What do we offer for you?Extensive benefits (phone, lunch, recreational, commuting and bike), substantial health insurance (inc. leisure time) and phone of your choice (max. 1200 euros inc. optional equipment)Time and materials for competence development and paid certificationsPossibility to choose your Way of working. You can either work from our modern and central offices in Helsinki or Turku, or remotely from home or hybrid. We offer ergonomic and modern equipment according to your Way of working model.Nice and helpful colleagues and healthy balance between work and private time. If you have any questions about the role, please reach out to Talent Acquisition Partner Sofia Hirvonen, name.surname(at)knowit.fi / 040 530 5860.

Grow. Make a difference. Together.Muotoilemme, rakennamme ja ylläpidämme kestäviä tulevaisuuden digitaalisia ratkaisuja - We are Makers of sustainable futureKnowit Data & Analytics -yksikkö keskittyy datan käsittelyyn, analysointiin ja varastointiin yhdessä asiakkaidemme kanssa. Etsimme nyt innostunutta ja osaavaa Senior Analytics Engineeriä liittymään osaksi porukkaamme!Työpäiväsi täyttyvät mielenkiintoisilla asiakasprojekteilla, joihin kuuluu muun muassa vaatimusmäärittelyiden suunnittelu asiakkaidemme kanssa, integraatioiden suunnittelu lähdejärjestelmistä ja sopivien pilvialustojen palveluiden valitseminen datan varastoimiseksi.Työssäsi käyt asiakkaidemme kanssa läpi tietovarastoratkaisujen vaatimuksia ja suunnittelet datan transformaatioita sekä tietovaraston arkkitehtuuria. Työskentelet myös osana asiakkaidemme datatiimiä tukemalla heitä ratkaisujen käytössä sekä osallistut pre-sales tehtäviin omalla asiantuntijuudellasi. Tämän työn ehdoton suola on todella vaihtelevat ja mielenkiintoiset asiakkaamme, jotka edustavat hyvin erilaisia toimialoja ja organisaatioita.Työyhteisönä olemme sparraileva, ja usein kehitämme omaa toimintaamme (kuten DataOps-ajattelua) verkostoitumalla monialaisesti kollegoiden kanssa uusien parhaiden käytäntöjen ideoinnin ja seuraavien asiakasta auttavien teknologioiden löytämisen parissa.Sinulla on erinomainen mahdollisuus tiiviiseen yhteistyöhön teknologiapartnereidemme kanssa, joiden tarjoamia sertifiointeja voit hyödyntää henkilökohtaisen kehittymisesi tueksi. Käytämme viimeisimpiä data-alan teknologioita, kuten Databricks, Snowflake ja dbt, sekä hyödynnämme laajasti yhteistyötä pilvialustakumppaniemme kanssa. Tärkeimmät pilvialustakumppanimme ovat AWS, Azure ja GCP.Mitä toivomme sinulta?Me knowitlaiset olemme kaikki ensisijaisesti tekijöitä eli Makereita; teemme sen mitä lupaamme ja suurella sydämellä. Olemme ylpeitä tekemisestämme ja isosta asiantuntijuudestamme. Maker-asenteen lisäksi odotamme sinulta vahvaa ymmärrystä Modern Data Stack -trendeistä, uskallusta katsoa tulevaan ja haastaa mennyttä, sekä näkemystä suunnitella asiakkaidemme data- ja liiketoimintatarpeita vastaavia ratkaisuja.Lisäksi toivomme, että sinulla löytyy jo aiempaa kattavaa kokemusta datan käsittelystä sekä moderneista pilvialustoista. Olet näkyvässä roolissa asiakasrajapinnassa, joten sinun tulee nauttia datanhallinnan haasteiden ratkomisesta ja ratkaisujen sparraamisesta asiakkaiden ja tiimin kanssa. Tehtäväsi edellyttää erinomaisia kommunikointi- ja vuorovaikutustaitoja sekä suomen että englannin kielellä.Näiden taitojen lisäksi arvostamme aitoa intoa jatkuvasti kehittää itseäsi datan ammattilaisena sekä hyödyntää alan uusimpia teknologioita.Työhösi liittyviä avainsanoja ovat mm. Snowflake, dbt, Azure, Databricks, Data Factory, AWS, Tableau, Power BI, SQL, Python, Spark, Synapse Mitä puolestaan me tarjoamme sinulle?Knowit tarjoaa sinulle oivan mahdollisuuden päästä loistamaan meidän Data & Analytics -tiimissämme sekä samalla laajentamaan ja syventämään osaamistasi alan kovimpien asiantuntijoiden joukossa. Pohjoismaissa olemme yksi johtavia data- ja analytiikkaratkaisujen toimijoita. Ylläpidämme tiiviisti partneruuttamme markkinoiden parhaimpien teknologiayritysten, kuten Tableau, Microsoft, dbt, Databricks, Snowflake sekä AWS.Olemme matala organisaatio ja meille jokainen saa tulla omana kokonaisena itsenään. Meille rento, toimiva ja ammattimainen työyhteisö on itseisarvo ja tiimikaveri on enintään yhden Slack-viestin päässä. Tarjoamme modernit toimistotilat Helsingissä, Tampereella ja Turussa, sekä ergonomiset työvälineet. Tämä rooli on vakituinen ja kokopäiväinen, ja meillä on mahdollista työskennellä sinulle sopivalla hybridimallilla. Tarjoamme sinulle totta kai myös kattavat työssäsi viihtymistä sekä hyvinvoinnistasi huolehtimista tukevat henkilöstöedut, joustavan työajan, erinomaisen työn ja vapaa-ajan balanssin, sekä laajat mahdollisuudet osaamisen kehittämiseen ja urasi boostaamiseen.Meiltä saat luottamusta ja vastuuta, ja teemme parhaamme, että sinulla on toiveisiisi istuvat ammatilliset mahdollisuudet onnistua tiimissämme. Monipuolinen datatekemisemme mahdollistaa osaamisesi kehittymisen, sekä pääset aidosti vaikuttamaan ja muokkaamaan tulevaisuuden datatoimintaamme.Jutellaanko lisää?Oletko sinä kenties seuraava Makerimme? Jos yllä oleva kuvaus osui yksiin sinun ammatillisten mielenkiinnon kohteittesi kanssa, ja voisit nähdä itsesi meidän riveissämme, niin me haluamme ehdottomasti kuulla sinusta lisää!Jos jokin jäi vielä mietityttämään tai haluat kuulla roolista tai meistä lisää, niin voit olla yhteydessä Talent Acquisition Partneriimme Annastiinaan, löydät hänen yhteystietonsa urasivuiltamme.Toivottavasti kuulemme sinusta pian!

You haven't found any open roles in your specific area of interest? This space is for you - tell us all about yourself here!Are you a skilled specialist in the world of IT? Do you want to join a diverse, dynamic team and take your expertise to the next level? If so, we want to hear from you - we are always looking for remarkable talent to become a part of Eficode.We want to know more about your experience, expertise and aspirations. Whether you are a software developer, DevOps engineer, project manager, cloud specialist, designer or accessibility expert, we believe there is a place for you with us.At Eficode, with over 580 professionals working in 10 countries, we provide our clients with a range of services related to software development, support and maintenance, design and accessibility, cloud computing and DevOps tooling. Our customer projects vary in terms of tech stack and industries, so you can work in the area and with technologies that are truly meaningful and interesting to you.So, if you are ready to take the next step in your career and work with some of the best professionals in the industry - get in touch. Tell us about yourself, your skills, and your aspirations, and let's see if we are a good match. We look forward to getting to know you!

Do you have a strong background in software development and experience in modern development methodologies? Do you want to be part of several different projects? You might be the one we are looking for!In our teams, we do work with passion, take projects seriously and without compromising on the quality. However, at work it’s ok to be, and actually should be fun as well!What would you do?As a Software Architect, you are able to translate our customer’s needs into a valid system, while anticipating potential limitations and risks. You understand the problems our clients face, not only from a technical perspective but also from a business point of view. At Eficode, software architects are usually exceptional coders, so you can manage development, planning and execution.With our customers, you work as a coach and a partner and are not afraid to advance solutions.You also make sure that projects move forward as planned and document the whole process.What do we expect from you?In addition to a diverse know-how, we expect you to be a consultant who is unafraid to offer ideas to customers.In our projects, we use a large technology stack and we hope you master at least a few of them, such as C#/.NET core, Java/Kotlin/Clojure/Scala, JavaScript/TypeScript/Node.js and Python/Django.We also expect you to know about the public cloud, as we run codes there, depending on the project.English being our working language, you must be fluent in it. Fluent Finnish is a significant advantage as some of our customers require speaking the happy people's language!Finally, willingness to keep on learning is key to ensure you stay up-to-date in the field.Are considered as a plus:Previous experience as a consultantPrevious experience in audit-like projectsSales support roleOther languages such as German or French for instance.About Eficode and our cultureEficode is the leading DevOps company in Europe, driving the DevOps movement and building the future of software development across 10 countries with about 580 professionals.These are the values guiding our work everyday:“We complete each other”: we believe in being who we are and learning from each other.“We learn every day”: continuous learning is our source of innovation. Your role within Eficode can evolve and you will have the opportunity to shape your experience in the DevOps world as you like.“We want to change the world”: we believe in change through software.“We take pride in results”: our experience and expertise move our customers forward.We are looking for new colleagues to join our offices in either Helsinki or Tampere, so we wish you are located in Finland.What it's in it for you?Friendly and inclusive culture with amazing colleaguesThorough well being support, including occupational healthcare, health insurance and childcare supportOpportunities for your skills development through various projects and trainingsPossibility for internal mobilityFreedom and responsibility in the way you conduct your workSupport in your career developmentCulture & Activity, Wellbeing, Public Transport, Lunch as well as a Bike benefits, which can also be used on an e-bike!Get-togethers with people that share your passionsWe eagerly wait for your application and CV. Please send them via the link below by 15.5.2023. This is a permanent position, which will be filled as soon as possible.We are looking forward to getting to know you!

You know DevOps and in particular Atlassian tooling. You have at heart to support your customers in doing better software. Why not joining Eficode, one of Atlassian partners? Eficode is looking for Devops consultants to join our talented team, so that in the future we can create even more value for our customers with the help of Atlassian products and services.What will you be doing?As a part of your daily work, you improve our customers’ competitiveness by developing and implementing Atlassian products into their software processes. This position is all about Atlassian technology stack expertise - it includes largely work on cloud migrations, but also server and data center.Sometimes you need to look deeper than the surface, by working out the SQL database behind the Atlassian, and sometimes it’s all about that indexing. Finally, you will give trainings and share your knowledge on the best approaches to solving each unique customer case.Your profile ideally fits into one of the following roles: Solution Architect / Lead Atlassian Consultant, Atlassian tools and methods Consultant or System Administrator. We make the role suit your professional aspirations and skillset. If you are more into offering help to Eficode customers in the form of implementation of business-process workflows and best practice administration of Jira and Confluence, don’t worry, we also need your expertise!At Eficode you are free to pick your path and develop your career in the direction you want - we support knowledge-sharing culture and offer lots of opportunities to learn all DevOps related skills (tools, processes, way of working, cloud) through training and certifications.What are we expecting from you?For starters, you have experience with DevOps related technologies and with implementing Atlassian solutions - including installations, upgrades, migrations and integrations. You also are able to provide guidance and recommendations based on best practices.As a great communicator, you support your customers the best you can and always try to find the right solution for them.In short, you are skilled in:Atlassian tooling (e.g. Jira, Confluence or Bitbucket)Continuous Delivery technology (e.g. Bamboo or Jenkins)Cloud migrations (e.g. AWS, Azure or Google)Communication skillsAre considered a significant advantage:Certifications in Atlassian productsSkills with scripting or SQL databaseAbout Eficode and our cultureEficode is the leading DevOps company in Europe, driving the DevOps movement and building the future of software development across 10 countries with over 580 professionals.These are the values guiding our work everyday:“We complete each other”: we believe in being who we are and learning from each other.“We learn every day”: continuous learning is our source of innovation. Your role within Eficode can evolve and you will have the opportunity to shape your experience in the DevOps world as you like.“We want to change the world”: we believe in change through software.“We take pride in results”: our experience and expertise move our customers forward.As an Eficodean you will get:Friendly and inclusive culture with amazing colleaguesFreedom and responsibility in the way you conduct your workThorough well being support, including occupational healthcare, health insurance and childcare supportOpportunities for your skills development through various projects and trainingsPossibility for internal mobilitySupport in your career developmentCulture & Activity, Wellbeing, Public Transport, Lunch as well as a Bike benefits, which can also be used on an e-bike!Get-togethers with people that share your passionsIf the thought of joining a work community peaks your interest, please apply! Send your CV and your salary expectation via the link below by 05.06.2023 and as soon as possible. We are looking forward to reading about you!

You haven't found any open roles in your specific area of interest? This space is for you - tell us all about yourself here!Are you a skilled specialist in the world of IT? Do you want to join a diverse, dynamic team and take your expertise to the next level? If so, we want to hear from you - we are always looking for remarkable talent to become a part of Eficode.We want to know more about your experience, expertise and aspirations. Whether you are a software developer, DevOps engineer, project manager, cloud specialist, designer or accessibility expert, we believe there is a place for you with us.At Eficode, with over 580 professionals working in 10 countries, we provide our clients with a range of services related to software development, support and maintenance, design and accessibility, cloud computing and DevOps tooling. Our customer projects vary in terms of tech stack and industries, so you can work in the area and with technologies that are truly meaningful and interesting to you.So, if you are ready to take the next step in your career and work with some of the best professionals in the industry - get in touch. Tell us about yourself, your skills, and your aspirations, and let's see if we are a good match. We look forward to getting to know you!

Right now at Eficode, we are looking for people passionate about DevOps, who would join us as consultants. In this role, you will be navigating our customers in the world of DevOps, and provide them with guidance related to tooling, processes and ways to improve the development lifecycle. You get to work with some of the best experts in the field, and have the freedom in selecting your projects.People say that some of the best things about working with us are our people and culture. So if you are interested in the topic, or just navigating a professional change - let’s have a chat to get to know each other better, and see where we can fit in each other’s paths:)What are the good-to-have skills?DevOps encompasses a bunch of various concepts and tools. Hence, we definitely don't expect you to be the master of everything. We rather find it very valuable if you’re a specialist in a specific area, with passion and curiosity to learn and develop.Some expertise that we’re looking for now could be:Cloud experts, skilled in related tech, for example Kubernetes, Azure and AWS.Test Automation specialists.DevOps tools - GitHub/Lab; Virtualization; Atlassian stack knowledge, etc.Apart from tech competences, we of course value interpersonal skills. Our ideal candidate is someone who will actively seek answers and solutions to our customers' questions and challenges, and then be able to communicate and implement them effectively.Besides communicating with our clients, you will be working in a very cool collaborative environment internally. We value the ability to work and connect with people from various backgrounds.About Eficode and our cultureEficode is the leading DevOps company in Europe, driving the DevOps movement and building the future of software development across 10 countries with over 580 professionals.These are the values guiding our work everyday:“We complete each other”: we believe in being who we are and learning from each other.“We learn every day”: continuous learning is our source of innovation. Do you have a strong background in software development and experience in modern development methodologies? Do you want to be part of several different projects? You might be the one we are looking for!In our teams, we do work with passion, take projects seriously and without compromising on the quality. However, at work it’s ok to be, and actually should be fun as well!What would you do?As a Software Architect, you are able to translate our customer’s needs into a valid system, while anticipating potential limitations and risks. You understand the problems our clients face, not only from a technical perspective but also from a business point of view. At Eficode, software architects are usually exceptional coders, so you can manage development, planning and execution.With our customers, you work as a coach and a partner and are not afraid to advance solutions.You also make sure that projects move forward as planned and document the whole process.What do we expect from you?In addition to a diverse know-how, we expect you to be a consultant who is unafraid to offer ideas to customers.In our projects, we use a large technology stack and we hope you master at least a few of them, such as C#/.NET core, Java/Kotlin/Clojure/Scala, JavaScript/TypeScript/Node.js and Python/Django.We also expect you to know about the public cloud, as we run codes there, depending on the project.English being our working language, you must be fluent in it. Please send them via the link below by 15.5.2023. This is a permanent position, which will be filled as soon as possible.We are looking forward to getting to know you!

Job DescriptionTeam purpose and missionWorking embedded with Data Scientists and other engineers to develop, deploy, scale and maintain impactful Machine Learning solutionsHelping data scientists and other engineers with Machine Learning and ML Platform & infrastructure related topics and questions. Increasing the level of ML engineering in the team.Monitoring, maintenance and troubleshooting of deployed solutionsContributing to our MLOps practices and liaising with the ML Platform teamWe have openings in multiple domains, such as personalisation & recommendations, search, logistics etc.📍This role can be based in one of our tech hubs in Helsinki, Berlin or Stockholm, or you can work remotely anywhere in Finland, Sweden, Germany, Denmark, and Estonia. Read more about our remote setup here. If you live outside of these countries - not to worry! We provide relocation support to help you make your way to Finland, Germany or Sweden.Our humble expectationsYou are experienced in end-to-end machine learning deployments and maintenance of deployed solutions and have at least 3+ years of experience in ML/MLOps.Furthermore, you bring solid experience in scaling and troubleshooting machine learning deployments to the table. You can help with the technical issues the teams encounter.A good understanding of ML and MLOps principles as well as Software engineering experience in Python should complete your profile.Ideally you also have experience in Docker, Kubernetes, Flyte, Seldon Core.Next StepsThe position will be filled as soon as we find the right person, so make sure to apply as soon as you realize you really, really want to join us!The compensation will be a negotiable combination of monthly pay and DoorDash RSUs. The latter makes it exceptionally easy to be excited about our company growing and doing well, as you’ll own a piece of the pie.For any further questions about the position, you can turn to Product+ Talent Acquisition Partner - Michal SzafraniecAbout WoltWolt is a technology company that makes it incredibly easy to discover and get the best restaurants, grocery stores and other local shops delivered to your home or office. Wolt is not just a delivery app – we’re a technology company building a commerce platform to seamlessly connect our millions of customers with thousands of merchant and courier partners, in real-time across 23 countries and 250+ cities. Our apps (iOS and Android) have the industry’s highest ratings, largely thanks to our customer-first-mindset, which shows in how we build products and run operations. In June 2022 we officially joined forces with DoorDash. Combined, we have a presence in 27 countries, 23 of which operate with the Wolt brand and app. Wolt and DoorDash continue largely independently, with Wolt’s name, brand, product, technology and team.Working in Product Development at WoltAt Wolt, we’re about getting things done. You’ll probably enjoy it here if you like taking ownership, developing yourself and being around friendly, humble and ambitious people.The behind the scenes of Wolt is run by an awesome bunch of over 400+ planners, builders, designers and data crunchers. We call ourselves Product+, as we’re the very core of Wolt’s products, tools and platforms. To build our products, we work in over 40 cross-functional, independent and autonomous teams. Teams are made up of a mix of talented individuals: engineers, designers, data scientists, analysts, and product leads. Each team takes ownership for solving customer problems in the best possible way.Our Commitment to Diversity, Equity & InclusionWe want to have all sorts of people in our team – people like you and me, and people different from you and me. To be able to work with diverse teammates – when it comes to gender, age, ethnicity, life background, sexual orientation, political views, religion, or any other personal trait – we consciously aim to offer equal opportunity for everyone to work with us. This is because we believe diverse teams make the most thought-through decisions and build things in the most inclusive way.Join us today to build Wolt together!

Job DescriptionAt the fast growing scale of the Wolt business our operational efficiency benefits greatly from having automation for managing supply (how many courier partners are online) and demand (how many orders are being placed by customers). For us it’s a clear win-win situation, but it takes an entire team to make sure that this is possible. 💪 So, in order to achieve our mission to build the best tools for keeping the fine balance between planning and forecasting of delivery services at any given time and place, we decided to strengthen our ranks by adding one more Backend Engineer to our teams in the Courier Group to balance out our own team needs!You will be working with frontend engineers, UX designers, backend engineers, and data scientists, and right now we’re building our supply and demand forecasting systems of the future, but we need your help in doing so! So, if you’re an experienced Python charmer with a background in machine learning or similar field, an interest in tackling scalability challenges, and building some real cool stuff, then be sure to drop us a line. 🐍 Also, you’ll get a chance to work closely together with our brilliant Data Scientists (seriously, this is a great chance to learn a lot about data science if you have a knack for it)!Still not sure? As a backend engineer, you will have a big impact on the team and you will be a key player in building a new platform that will help us create reliable forecasts which consume large amounts of operator sourced data where operators can input and alter planning data and can trigger model runs based on their inputs. You’ll also work on designing and implementing APIs, helping data scientists integrate their new ML-based models, as well as setting up data pipelines between our backend and data warehouse, so there’s quite a lot of exciting things going on!📍These roles can be based in one of our tech hubs in Helsinki, Berlin or Stockholm, or you can work remotely anywhere in Finland, Germany or Sweden. Read more about our remote setup 👉 here.Our humble expectations👉 You have fluent programing skills using modern Python, have experience setting up backend microservices, and building solid scalable services and well-structured applications using it.👉 You preferably have experience working with machine learning or similar computational methods👉 You have experience working with Docker and Kubernetes for containerization and orchestration as well as familiarity with database technologies, such as PostgreSQL.👉 You have an analytical and curious way of thinking and are comfortable working with real-world data and its different nuances👉 Since the backend has mostly been written in Python (ofc) and Scala, if you have previous experience and willingness to tinker in the backend with Scala - even better, we consider that a plus!👉 Most importantly, you’re a dedicated person who is pragmatic with a positive attitude, who doesn't shy away from going outside of their comfort zone, and demonstrates curiosity and willingness to keep continuously learning.Next StepsThe position will be filled as soon as we find the right person, so make sure to apply as soon as you realize you really, really want to join us!💯 Overall our product organization consists of a team of over 500 people at Wolt. We aim to build none other than the best-in-the-world engineering team here.💙 You’ll get to work in a company culture where we take ownership beyond the obvious, do common things uncommonly well, we think big but stay humble, do right by people, we treat others kindly and justly, recognise that if we don’t learn, we won’t stay still but fall behind, and keep in mind that Luke was Yoda’s greatest achievement.🙌 Join us for an exciting journey! The compensation will be a negotiable combination of monthly pay and DoorDash equity. The latter makes it exceptionally easy to be excited about our company growing and doing well, as you’ll own a piece of the pie.For any further questions about the position, you can turn to Product+ Talent Acquisition Partner - Lina Muncyte (lina.muncyte(at)wolt.com).About WoltWolt is a technology company that makes it incredibly easy to discover and get the best restaurants, grocery stores and other local shops delivered to your home or office. Wolt is not just a delivery app – we’re a technology company building a commerce platform to seamlessly connect our millions of customers with thousands of merchant and courier partners, in real-time across 23 countries and 250+ cities. Our apps (iOS and Android) have the industry’s highest ratings, largely thanks to our customer-first-mindset, which shows in how we build products and run operations. In June 2022 we officially joined forces with DoorDash. Combined, we have a presence in 27 countries, 23 of which operate with the Wolt brand and app. Wolt and DoorDash continue largely independently, with Wolt’s name, brand, product, technology and team.Working in Product Development at WoltAt Wolt, we’re about getting things done. You’ll probably enjoy it here if you like taking ownership, developing yourself and being around friendly, humble and ambitious people.The behind the scenes of Wolt is run by an awesome bunch of over 400+ planners, builders, designers and data crunchers. We call ourselves Product+, as we’re the very core of Wolt’s products, tools and platforms. To build our products, we work in over 40 cross-functional, independent and autonomous teams. Teams are made up of a mix of talented individuals: engineers, designers, data scientists, analysts, and product leads. Each team takes ownership for solving customer problems in the best possible way.Our Commitment to Diversity, Equity & InclusionWe want to have all sorts of people in our team – people like you and me, and people different from you and me. To be able to work with diverse teammates – when it comes to gender, age, ethnicity, life background, sexual orientation, political views, religion, or any other personal trait – we consciously aim to offer equal opportunity for everyone to work with us. This is because we believe diverse teams make the most thought-through decisions and build things in the most inclusive way.Join us today to build Wolt together!_1

Job DescriptionAre you an experienced finance professional with a solid background in designing and managing finance processes in a complex, fast-moving environment? Does playing a key role in shaping financial processes in a global tech company sound like your ideal next opportunity? If so, we would love to hear from you!Role BackgroundWolt Finance and especially the Record to Report area is going through changes from outsourced model to internal financial services. We are on our way of creating a world-class financial team with ambition to streamline processes, unify our accounting practices and increase automation level at the same time with rapid company growth. The Process Specialist is taking responsibility for these endeavors together with the Process Owner, other finance teams, product teams and external service providers.Sounds simple, right?While the role is key to enable our continued success, and the challenge great, fear not - as you'll not be alone for the ride. In this role, you will work closely with development-oriented finance- and operations experts as well as highly skilled product engineers to make sure we design our processes in ways that are both efficient and scalable. The environment is complex and challenging, but you will enjoy the thrill of nurturing your own thoughts and ideas into reality, while enjoying the support of our experienced professionals across various teams.This is an exciting opportunity to develop finance process practices in one of Europe's fastest growing tech companies. If you feel like the role matches your experience and you're ready for the next challenge, read on and apply - we're looking forward to meeting you!What You’ll Be DoingParticipate and lead the selected Record to Report process improvement initiativesUse in-depth accounting and process knowledge to drive process harmonization to all Wolt entitiesIdentify automation needs and drive through automation / system improvements for the Record to Report processesProactively interact with various finance teams, product owners and engineering teams to make sure we are progressing with agreed development actionsIdentify system enhancements needs, act as one of the key users for the ERP and/or any other Record to Report owned systemsDrive efficient deployment of new processes with strong on-boarding and training programs for RTR end usersMaintain RTR process related documentation Our humble expectationsSolid background in harmonizing accounting processes and implementation of end to end processes. Ideally, you’ll have prior experiences (being part / implementation of harmonization projects) from a similar position in a multinational organizationHighly passionate about translating finance requirements into concrete Accounting process / system requirements Proactive in seeking out improvement opportunities and driving collaboration across stakeholder groupProject management experienceStrong plus having experience in a high-paced startup environmentStrong communication skills and interpersonal skillsComfortable working fully in EnglishNext StepsNext stepsIf you are excited about working in a high-growth environment, taking ownership of things you care about, and being part of an ambitious group of professionals, then click below to apply and get the conversation going!Along with a competitive salary and benefits, you will also be eligible for our stock option plan.You will fit into a truly diverse team across 23 countries - what really matters to us is a caring and welcoming environment where we embrace uniqueness and celebrate diversity. Experience a company culture where we work on eye level, decisions are made quickly and knowledge sharing, as well as mentoring, is on our daily agenda.If you have any further questions about the position, you can turn to:Kalle Sundell, Talent Acqusition Partner at kalle.sundell@wolt.comPlease note that we do not accept applications sent by mail. You should submit your application through our careers website!About WoltAbout Wolt Wolt is a technology company that makes it incredibly easy to discover and get the best restaurants, grocery stores and other local shops delivered to home or to the office. Our local commerce platform makes it easy for customers to order whatever they need on one app, for merchants to make additional sales, and for couriers to make meaningful earnings flexibly. To enable this, Wolt develops a wide range of technologies from local commerce platform to retail software and financial solutions, as well as operates its own grocery stores under the brand Wolt Market. Wolt was founded in 2014 and joined forces with DoorDash in 2022. DoorDash operates in 27 countries today, 23 of which are with the Wolt product and brand. So, why work at Wolt?At Wolt, We’re About Getting Things Done.You’ll probably enjoy it here if you like taking ownership, developing yourself and being around friendly, humble and ambitious people.We work hard to make cities into better places, and it’s pretty cool seeing us grow every week. If you’re passionate about building things that just… work, Wolt might be for you.Our Commitment to Diversity, Equity & InclusionWe want to have all sorts of people in our team – people like you and me, and people different from you and me. To be able to work with diverse teammates – when it comes to gender, age, ethnicity, life background, sexual orientation, political views, religion, or any other personal trait – we consciously aim to offer equal opportunity for everyone to work with us. This is because we believe diverse teams make the most thought-through decisions and build things in the most inclusive way.Join us today to build Wolt together.
