Job DescriptionWe are putting together a new engineering team in our Data domain and we are looking for someone to take its lead! If you’re looking for a role to combine your engineering and leadership skills in a very complex area - this is it! 🚀During the latter part of 2022 we have gained more understanding of where we should be with our data warehousing in terms of layout and features. The current warehouse is architected primarily as a source data store and requires a lot of domain knowledge to extract maximum value out of the data.The adoption of our data warehouse is a key point to perform decision making in multiple different scenarios -- product A/B testing, operational efficiency, business efficiency, to name a few. With these use cases expanding across all organizations at Wolt, having a more ergonomic and less cumbersome data model becomes essential to support faster and safer data analysis.Together with your team you will be responsible for architecting, developing, managing and improving Wolt’s Data Warehouse Data Model, making sure it can be integrated with the workflow of our Analysts and the rest of the organization and our Data Engineering tools, ultimately becoming the one stop shop for sourcing data for all BI use cases and more.📍This role can be based in one of our tech hubs in Helsinki, Berlin or Stockholm, or you can work remotely anywhere in Finland, Sweden, Germany, Denmark, and Estonia. Read more about our remote setup here. If you live outside of these countries - not to worry! We provide relocation support to help you make your way to Finland, Germany or Sweden.Our humble expectationsAs a Team Lead you will be planning the work and focus areas to ensure our next generation Data Warehouse Data Model can be implemented and rolled out, while helping the team get settled with ways of working. You want to take care of your team members, help them strive and achieve goals together! You’ll be making personal development plans and hosting regular 1on1s to support their growth, as well as have a huge role in hiring the right people to the team.Good communication and collaboration skills are essential, and you shouldn’t shy away from problems, but can discuss them in a constructive way with your team and the Wolt Product team at large.Your solid background in data modelling and data engineering will allow you to integrate the concepts within our data stack. You will be able to speak the same language with your team and others, as well as contribute to the hands-on work. We work with Python, Kafka, Spark, Postgres, Snowflake, & Kubernetes. The nature of our business causes our data to have high density, cardinality, speed and size. We often see datasets in the >100B scale at this point.We also highly appreciate any previous experience in team leading, and as mentioned, are looking for the combination of technical and people leading skills.Next StepsThe position will be filled as soon as we find the right person, so make sure to apply as soon as you realize you really, really want to join us!For any further questions about the position, you can turn to Product+ Talent Acquisition Partner - Anna Janeta (anna.janeta@wolt.com)About WoltWolt is a technology company that makes it incredibly easy to discover and get the best restaurants, grocery stores and other local shops delivered to your home or office. Wolt is not just a delivery app – we’re a technology company building a commerce platform to seamlessly connect our millions of customers with thousands of merchant and courier partners, in real-time across 23 countries and 250+ cities. Our apps (iOS and Android) have the industry’s highest ratings, largely thanks to our customer-first-mindset, which shows in how we build products and run operations. In June 2022 we officially joined forces with DoorDash. Combined, we have a presence in 27 countries, 23 of which operate with the Wolt brand and app. Wolt and DoorDash continue largely independently, with Wolt’s name, brand, product, technology and team.Working in Product Development at WoltAt Wolt, we’re about getting things done. You’ll probably enjoy it here if you like taking ownership, developing yourself and being around friendly, humble and ambitious people.The behind the scenes of Wolt is run by an awesome bunch of over 400+ planners, builders, designers and data crunchers. We call ourselves Product+, as we’re the very core of Wolt’s products, tools and platforms. To build our products, we work in over 40 cross-functional, independent and autonomous teams. Teams are made up of a mix of talented individuals: engineers, designers, data scientists, analysts, and product leads. Each team takes ownership for solving customer problems in the best possible way.Our Commitment to Diversity, Equity & InclusionWe want to have all sorts of people in our team – people like you and me, and people different from you and me. To be able to work with diverse teammates – when it comes to gender, age, ethnicity, life background, sexual orientation, political views, religion, or any other personal trait – we consciously aim to offer equal opportunity for everyone to work with us. This is because we believe diverse teams make the most thought-through decisions and build things in the most inclusive way.Join us today to build Wolt together!

Job DescriptionWe are putting together a new engineering team in our Data domain and we are looking for someone to take its lead! You won’t be starting entirely from scratch as Wolt’s Data Group has already developed an initial foundational tooling in the areas of data management, security, auditing, data catalog and quality monitoring. Despite this, we haven’t had a dedicated team for this tooling yet.If you’re looking for a role to combine your engineering and leadership skills in a very complex area - this is it! 🚀In the past few years we integrated many of these tools within our core data infrastructure and thanks to these efforts the teams contributing to the data platform have developed a good understanding when it comes to the Data Governance domain.We’re forming this team to take this work to the next level and ensure Wolt’s Data Platform keeps on meeting the governance requirements that a modern data company needs to meet.Together with your team you will be responsible for managing and improving the current Data Governance platform, making sure it can be further integrated with the rest of the Data Platform and Wolt Services in a scalable, secure and compliant way.In addition to this the team will be responsible for concepting and building all new components and processes necessary for scaling these capabilities further as required.📍This role can be based in one of our tech hubs in Helsinki, Berlin or Stockholm, or you can work remotely anywhere in Finland, Sweden, Germany, Denmark, and Estonia. Read more about our remote setup here. If you live outside of these countries - not to worry! We provide relocation support to help you make your way to Finland, Germany or Sweden.Our humble expectationsAs a Team Lead you will be planning the work and focus areas for our Data Governance Platform efforts and help the team get settled with suitable ways of working. As a Team Lead at Wolt you want to take care of your team members, help them strive and achieve goals together! You’ll be making personal development plans and hosting regular 1on1s to support their growth and take part in recruitment. Good communication and collaboration skills are essential, and you shouldn’t shy away from problems, but can discuss them in a constructive way with your team and the Wolt Product team at large.You are the rare gem who also has a solid engineering background married to sensitivity to the Data Governance challenges, so you will be able to speak the same language with your team and stakeholders, including our Legal and Finance teams, as well as contribute to the hands-on work. In this domain we work with Python, Snowflake, Kubernetes and a variety of open source tools such as DataHub and Airflow.We also highly appreciate any previous experience in team leading, and as mentioned, are looking for the combination of technical and people leading skills.Next StepsThe position will be filled as soon as we find the right person, so make sure to apply as soon as you realize you really, really want to join us!For any further questions about the position, you can turn to Product+ Talent Acquisition Partner - Anna Janeta (anna.janeta@wolt.com)About WoltWolt is a technology company that makes it incredibly easy to discover and get the best restaurants, grocery stores and other local shops delivered to your home or office. Wolt is not just a delivery app – we’re a technology company building a commerce platform to seamlessly connect our millions of customers with thousands of merchant and courier partners, in real-time across 23 countries and 250+ cities. Our apps (iOS and Android) have the industry’s highest ratings, largely thanks to our customer-first-mindset, which shows in how we build products and run operations. In June 2022 we officially joined forces with DoorDash. Combined, we have a presence in 27 countries, 23 of which operate with the Wolt brand and app. Wolt and DoorDash continue largely independently, with Wolt’s name, brand, product, technology and team.Working in Product Development at WoltAt Wolt, we’re about getting things done. You’ll probably enjoy it here if you like taking ownership, developing yourself and being around friendly, humble and ambitious people.The behind the scenes of Wolt is run by an awesome bunch of over 400+ planners, builders, designers and data crunchers. We call ourselves Product+, as we’re the very core of Wolt’s products, tools and platforms. To build our products, we work in over 40 cross-functional, independent and autonomous teams. Teams are made up of a mix of talented individuals: engineers, designers, data scientists, analysts, and product leads. Each team takes ownership for solving customer problems in the best possible way.Our Commitment to Diversity, Equity & InclusionWe want to have all sorts of people in our team – people like you and me, and people different from you and me. To be able to work with diverse teammates – when it comes to gender, age, ethnicity, life background, sexual orientation, political views, religion, or any other personal trait – we consciously aim to offer equal opportunity for everyone to work with us. This is because we believe diverse teams make the most thought-through decisions and build things in the most inclusive way.Join us today to build Wolt together!

Job DescriptionOur Global Operations team is a task force within Wolt that helps our country teams’ business grow and scale. Global Operations drive long-term strategy, scalable processes, and sustainable business models across our entire base of operations. We work closely with our local teams, general management and key functional leaders across dimensions such as product and analytics, and drive forward company-wide projects with high strategic importance.The team is now looking for several Pricing Analysts to join the fun and challenging space of delivery operations..Our Pricing team ensures our pricing model is efficient, fair, and competitive across our 23 markets. As a Pricing analyst, you will be responsible for a set of countries. Your scope includes: maintaining up-to-date market and competitive intelligence; continuously identifying improvement opportunities in our pricing model and working with operations managers to execute changes; and analyzing the impact of changes on courier behavior, profitability, and delivery quality.In this role, you will report to our Head of Delivery Pricing and be in daily contact with the Operations Managers and Associates of the countries you are responsible for.What You'll Be DoingFor the scope of countries you will be responsible for:Identifying the need for pricing actions based on short and medium-term delivery performance trendsSharing pricing recommendations with Operations Managers and Associates and coordinating initiative implementationImproving our current pricing models and reports in collaboration with the other pricing analystsLeading pricing intelligence effortsUndertaking other initiatives that will come up; we are still a young team, so we will still have a lot to build together!Our humble expectationsAt least a bachelor's degree (in finance, mathematics, business, or related fields) and 3-5 years of work experience, preferably in revenue management, pricing, or related areasStellar capabilities in strategic thinking, analytical execution and reporting. Excel is a must, but you’ll find VBA, SQL and Python useful as wellProactive ownership mentality - an independent thinker who can work with limited guidance, but through grit and determination can deliver a successful outcome.The ability to work in cross-functional teams, maintain and manage relationships with multiple stakeholdersA true culture champion - someone that leads by example with collaboration, teamwork, data-driven decision making and best-idea-wins attitude. We also value humility and politeness at all times!Excellent written and oral communication skills in English.Eligible to work in the EU, and willingness to (re)locate to one of our business focal points e.g. Helsinki or Berlin.Next StepsIf you are creative, like moving fast, and thrive in a dynamic environment where you get to be proactive and figure out what to do (rather than wait to be told) – then apply today.What You’ll Get By Joining UsOpportunity to be part of building something exceptional, in an international environmentLots of learning and growth in a globally scaling tech companyCompetitive salary + stock options availableIf you have any further questions about the position, you can turn to:Andras Toth, Talent Acquisition Partner - andras.toth@external.wolt.comPlease note that we do not accept applications sent by mail. You should submit your application through our careers website!About WoltWolt is a technology company that makes it incredibly easy to discover and get the best restaurants, grocery stores and other local shops delivered to your home or office. Since launching 7 years ago, Wolt has expanded from a restaurant food delivery platform in the Nordics to a leading player in the delivery of everything across EMEA. Wolt works together with tens of thousands of restaurant and retail partners, as well as with over a hundred thousand courier partners across 23 countries and 250+ cities. In November 2021 Wolt and DoorDash announced they are joining forces, and the transaction is expected to close in H1 2022. We continue to expand rapidly and are looking for more talented individuals to join us.Wolt not only offers great apps to customers and partners, but is also developing a broad range of technologies and solutions. Our apps (iOS and Android) have the industry’s highest reviews, largely because of our customer-centric approach to how we build our products and operations. For example, our customer service team responds in a matter of minutes, in the customer’s own language. So, why work at Wolt?At Wolt, We’re About Getting Things Done.You’ll probably enjoy it here if you like taking ownership, developing yourself and being around friendly, humble and ambitious people.We work hard to make cities into better places, and it’s pretty cool seeing us grow every week. If you’re passionate about building things that just… work, Wolt might be for you.Our Commitment to Diversity, Equity & InclusionWe want to have all sorts of people in our team – people like you and me, and people different from you and me. To be able to work with diverse teammates – when it comes to gender, age, ethnicity, life background, sexual orientation, political views, religion, or any other personal trait – we consciously aim to offer equal opportunity for everyone to work with us. This is because we believe diverse teams make the most thought-through decisions and build things in the most inclusive way.Join us today to build Wolt together.

At Silo AI our team of 200+ AI Engineers, AI Scientists, Solutions Architects, Software Developers, and Designers collaborate closely to tackle challenging real-world problems related to AI. Now we are looking for AI Engineers to build MLOps solutions for quality ML development and scalable AI utilizations in multi-cloud environments. The work is done as part of our Helsinki, Tampere, Turku, Jyväskylä, Oulu, Stockholm or Copenhagen teams.What Will You Be DoingBuilding versatile ML development and AI deployment setups (pipelines and/or platforms) and other MLOps solutions to enable production-level AI and ML in multi-cloud environments and sometimes in connection to IoT and embedded settingsWork very practically hand-on but also designing the needed architectures and workflows - enabled by Silo AI assets and learning from versatile project casesWork as part of the team with leading AI experts and use cutting edge tools to train, deploy and service advanced machine learning models Working in client projects in various different industries that typically lasts 3-6 months, but we also work in long-term projects lasting 1-2 years Contributing to Cloud AI & MLOps community and R&D work of Silo AIWhat We Are Looking For From YouYou have strong experience in software development Experience in training, versioning, deploying, monitoring and/or maintaining machine learning modelsYou have knowledge of cloud platforms and technologies (e.g. Kubernetes, Azure, AWS and/or Google Cloud)You are experienced in programming with Python and can adopt other programming languages. You are familiar with some typical MLOps tools, such as KubeFlow, MLFlow, KFServing/KServe, Seldon, Airflow, Argo, Prefect or others; some DevOps tooling such as Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform scripting (or CloudFormation or similar); some machine learning frameworks, such as Tensorflow and/or PyTorch; some logging tools, such as ElasticStack, Grafana, Prometheus and/or othersYou have a track record of producing quality code and developing software with different practices (CI/CD, version control, some variety of agile development)You may have also DataOps related experience around storage (SQL, NoSQL, cloud), processing (batch, stream, ETL), managing/versioning, security, visualization and/or big dataYou are interested in working and communicating with Silo AI clients and working part of the team with Silo experts Be able to learn new skills and adapt quickly, as the problems, tools, best practices, and architectures are rapidly changing. What Silo Ai Offers To YouReal-world and production-level projects related to AI in various different industries such as retail, manufacturing, machine industry, automotive, pharma, telecom, smart devices, medical, energy & infra, logistics, healthcare, and internet services High-level & diverse tech and non-tech expertise around you as peers with our team of 200+ employees and 20+ nationalities Cloud AI & MLOps community which includes 30+ experts and a lot of information sharing and learning resources - and our other three technology areas include IoT, Embedded and Connectivity which bring their own additions to the MLOps work Learning culture with several different learning activities to support your learning such as 1-1 talent coaching with lead level experts, self-development benefit, company-wide workshops, internal research club bi-weekly basis Silo social activities like daily meditation, virtual lunches, and company-wide all-hands every Friday, company supported Silo social activities Growth company environment - in 2021 we have hired around 100 new employees and opened up a new office in Copenhagen, Denmark. In 2022 we are looking for hiring even more employees than in 2021 and opening up new countries in addition to the three current ones. Possibility to become Silo shareholderNormal benefits such as work equipment of own choice, occupational healthcare, sports & culture vouchers, internet, lunch through Wolt on Fridays, self-development budgetOUR CULTUREWhat we believe in at SiloBuild bonds - Trust is our bond. We connect with customers and seek to understand how we can best help, and always keep what we promise. We encourage a culture in which successes are celebrated, learnings shared and support provided for our team members to succeed. Be good - Positive impact. We strive to be transparent and open, take responsibility and ownership, and aim for positive impact and results in all we do. We take pride in creating an equal and supportive workplace for talented and ambitious professionals from all nationalities, genders, and backgrounds. Ask why - Know your why. We have the courage and agility to keep challenging what we're doing to assure value creation for customers. We encourage open dialogue and debate and strive for diversity in opinions to improve decision making. Keep learning - Grow to excel. We aim for excellence by learning from the market, sharing our competence, and recruiting a growth mindset. For us expertise is not an achievement, it's a lifestyle of curiosity, learning, sharing, and working with people who share the same hunger. WANT TO KNOW MORE?You can ask more about Silo AI as a workplace from our Talent Acquisition Lead Emmi Matvejeff, emmi.matvejeff@silo.ai

Job DescriptionAre you an experienced finance professional with a solid background in designing and managing finance processes in a complex, fast-moving environment? Does playing a key role in shaping financial processes in a global tech company sound like your ideal next opportunity? If so, we would love to hear from you!Role BackgroundWolt Finance and especially the Record to Report area is going through changes from outsourced model to internal financial services. We are on our way of creating a world-class financial team with ambition to streamline processes, unify our accounting practices and increase automation level at the same time with rapid company growth. The Process Specialist is taking responsibility for these endeavors together with the Process Owner, other finance teams, product teams and external service providers.Sounds simple, right?While the role is key to enable our continued success, and the challenge great, fear not - as you'll not be alone for the ride. In this role, you will work closely with development-oriented finance- and operations experts as well as highly skilled product engineers to make sure we design our processes in ways that are both efficient and scalable. The environment is complex and challenging, but you will enjoy the thrill of nurturing your own thoughts and ideas into reality, while enjoying the support of our experienced professionals across various teams.This is an exciting opportunity to develop finance process practices in one of Europe's fastest growing tech companies. If you feel like the role matches your experience and you're ready for the next challenge, read on and apply - we're looking forward to meeting you!What You’ll Be DoingParticipate and lead the selected Record to Report process improvement initiativesUse in-depth accounting and process knowledge to drive process harmonization to all Wolt entitiesIdentify automation needs and drive through automation / system improvements for the Record to Report processesProactively interact with various finance teams, product owners and engineering teams to make sure we are progressing with agreed development actionsIdentify system enhancements needs, act as one of the key users for the ERP and/or any other Record to Report owned systemsDrive efficient deployment of new processes with strong on-boarding and training programs for RTR end usersMaintain RTR process related documentation Our humble expectationsSolid background in harmonizing accounting processes and implementation of end to end processes. Ideally, you’ll have prior experiences (being part / implementation of harmonization projects) from a similar position in a multinational organizationHighly passionate about translating finance requirements into concrete Accounting process / system requirements Proactive in seeking out improvement opportunities and driving collaboration across stakeholder groupProject management experienceStrong plus having experience in a high-paced startup environmentStrong communication skills and interpersonal skillsComfortable working fully in EnglishNext StepsNext stepsIf you are excited about working in a high-growth environment, taking ownership of things you care about, and being part of an ambitious group of professionals, then click below to apply and get the conversation going!Along with a competitive salary and benefits, you will also be eligible for our stock option plan.You will fit into a truly diverse team across 23 countries - what really matters to us is a caring and welcoming environment where we embrace uniqueness and celebrate diversity. Experience a company culture where we work on eye level, decisions are made quickly and knowledge sharing, as well as mentoring, is on our daily agenda.If you have any further questions about the position, you can turn to:Kalle Sundell, Talent Acqusition Partner at kalle.sundell@wolt.comPlease note that we do not accept applications sent by mail. You should submit your application through our careers website!About WoltAbout Wolt Wolt is a technology company that makes it incredibly easy to discover and get the best restaurants, grocery stores and other local shops delivered to home or to the office. Our local commerce platform makes it easy for customers to order whatever they need on one app, for merchants to make additional sales, and for couriers to make meaningful earnings flexibly. To enable this, Wolt develops a wide range of technologies from local commerce platform to retail software and financial solutions, as well as operates its own grocery stores under the brand Wolt Market. Wolt was founded in 2014 and joined forces with DoorDash in 2022. DoorDash operates in 27 countries today, 23 of which are with the Wolt product and brand. So, why work at Wolt?At Wolt, We’re About Getting Things Done.You’ll probably enjoy it here if you like taking ownership, developing yourself and being around friendly, humble and ambitious people.We work hard to make cities into better places, and it’s pretty cool seeing us grow every week. If you’re passionate about building things that just… work, Wolt might be for you.Our Commitment to Diversity, Equity & InclusionWe want to have all sorts of people in our team – people like you and me, and people different from you and me. To be able to work with diverse teammates – when it comes to gender, age, ethnicity, life background, sexual orientation, political views, religion, or any other personal trait – we consciously aim to offer equal opportunity for everyone to work with us. This is because we believe diverse teams make the most thought-through decisions and build things in the most inclusive way.Join us today to build Wolt together.

Job DescriptionWorld-class customer service is one of the cornerstones of Wolt 💙 Over the years we have invested a lot in our in-house built support tooling as we believe that it’s the only way we can ensure satisfaction for all of our customers and partners in each of the 23 countries that we operate in. We take huge pride in our customer operations’ quality, so on top of building delightful support experiences in our consumer app we also want to proactively identify and solve issues even before our customers and partners even notice something might be wrong.To make sure that our more than 20M+ monthly users are able to get help as quickly as possible, we have a team that is building a self-service support platform. The platform will allow us to design self-service flows with a no-code solution and then deploy them into the hands of customers in a matter of minutes.We work with high ownership in small teams where each team member works around the whole software development life cycle. Each and every one of our product team members have a say in where we are going and what solutions we implement. Being a member of the team, you’ll collaborate closely with the designer, product manager, and other engineers in your team.📍This role can be based in one of our tech hubs in Helsinki, Berlin, or Stockholm, or you can work remotely anywhere in Finland, Sweden, Germany, Denmark, and Estonia. Read more about our remote setup here. If you live outside of these countries - do not worry! We provide relocation support to help you make your way to Finland, Germany, or Sweden.Our humble expectationsYou might be the one if you are an engineer with experience in designing and building top-class software and APIs, and enthusiasm toward working with Python is naturally essential. We mostly work with Python (FastAPI & Flask), MongoDB, and PostgreSQL, and appreciate it if you understand what it takes to build and operate scalable software services in production. Our massive backend is powered with Kubernetes in AWS so proficiency in these platforms or similar cloud infrastructure is a huge plus.Aside from technology, we expect you to be a product-oriented problem solver, a good communicator, willing to collaborate with people in and outside of your own team, and keen to bring up issues in a constructive manner to the team and to Wolt at large.Next StepsThe position will be filled as soon as we find the right person, so make sure to apply as soon as you realize you really, really want to join us!The compensation will be a negotiable combination of monthly pay and DoorDash RSUs. The latter makes it exceptionally easy to be excited about our company growing and doing well, as you’ll own a piece of the pie.For any further questions about the position, you can turn to Product+ Talent Acquisition Partner - Salem Mansuri (salem.mansuri@external.wolt.com)About WoltWolt is a technology company that makes it incredibly easy to discover and get the best restaurants, grocery stores and other local shops delivered to your home or office. Job DescriptionWe are looking for Senior Backend Engineers to join our Payment Integrations team, to build a world-class payment infrastructure. As Wolt operates internationally in over 23 countries and over 200 cities, these teams are in a vital spot for e.g. enabling a smooth payment experience for our +10 million customers and ensuring stable, safe and error-proof money flows. The Payments Group at Wolt consists of 3 teams out of which the Payment integrations team is responsible for offering reliable and scalable payments options to millions of users in 23+ countries. In those countries we support a growing number of local and international payment methods such as lunch cards, credit cards and, mobile wallets such as ApplePay and GooglePay.Within the role, you will be working in an autonomous agile team working closely with designers, data scientists and product leads and our international partners. Your day-to-day responsibilities will include the whole development process (business logic, testing, database & data streaming, CI/CD, analytics, monitoring and alerting solutions). We are looking for someone who appreciates teamwork and has good communication and interaction skills. You enjoy varied work tasks and are able to learn and work with a wide range of different technologies and tools, and you are not afraid to take on new challenges.We believe in high level of ownership within the teams of Wolt, and as a member of our team you will have chance to contribute to the team's future development plans, ways of working, technology choices, and ultimately get to design & build integral and high impact projects, influencing millions of users across the Wolt platform.As the business is 24/7 so must our services be. We have a lot of highly challenging engineering topics for seasoned seniors - event-driven, asynchronous service design, blitzscaling business requirements and a strong emphasis on automation.This role can be based in one of our tech hubs in Stockholm, Helsinki or Berlin, or you can work remotely anywhere in Finland, Sweden, Germany, Denmark, and Estonia. Read more about our remote setup here.Our humble expectationsWe are building our services in Python and looking for the ability to develop production-level microservices in Python (FastAPI, Flask) from the get-go and willingness to learn other modern languages as well if needed.Our engineers have wide responsibilities over the whole development lifecycle so knowledge of tools such as PostgreSQL, Docker, and K8 as well as some experience with any cloud platform such as AWS will become handy. We are looking for engineers who can solve problems together, think about big problems such as scalability and availability and sometimes go against the current to also challenge the common decision. Understanding Fintech & Payments will help you succeed, but please don’t let it get in the way if it’s a new area for you - we’re sure you’d get a grasp of things quickly once you start!In addition to technical expertise, we value taking ownership beyond the obvious, your motivation to learn new things you don’t yet master, ability to make decisions together with your team and willingness to collaborate with different teams Woltwide.Next StepsThe position will be filled as soon as we find the right person, so make sure to apply as soon as you realize you really, really want to join us!The compensation will be a negotiable combination of monthly pay and equity. The latter makes it exceptionally easy to be excited about our company growing and doing well, as you’ll own a piece of the pie.If you want to check up on your application or have any further questions about the position you can turn to Talent Acquisition Partner, Ryan Kim, at ryan.kim(at)wolt.com at any given time.About WoltWolt is a technology company that makes it incredibly easy to discover and get the best restaurants, grocery stores and other local shops delivered to your home or office. You’ll probably enjoy it here if you like taking ownership, developing yourself and being around friendly, humble and ambitious people.The behind the scenes of Wolt is run by an awesome bunch of over 400+ planners, builders, designers and data crunchers. We call ourselves Product+, as we’re the very core of Wolt’s products, tools and platforms. To build our products, we work in over 40 cross-functional, independent and autonomous teams. Teams are made up of a mix of talented individuals: engineers, designers, data scientists, analysts, and product leads. Each team takes ownership for solving customer problems in the best possible way.Our Commitment to Diversity, Equity & InclusionWe want to have all sorts of people in our team – people like you and me, and people different from you and me. To be able to work with diverse teammates – when it comes to gender, age, ethnicity, life background, sexual orientation, political views, religion, or any other personal trait – we consciously aim to offer equal opportunity for everyone to work with us. This is because we believe diverse teams make the most thought-through decisions and build things in the most inclusive way.Join us today to build Wolt together!

Job DescriptionThis role can be based in one of our tech hubs in Helsinki or Berlin, or you can work remotely anywhere in Finland, Sweden, Germany, Denmark, and Estonia. Read more about our remote setup here.The Merchant Group at Wolt is looking for multiple frontend engineers to join multiple different teams. The stack is React + Typescript on the frontend.Wolt as a platform focuses on serving three main groups: the customers, the couriers and the merchants. There are multiple teams focusing on separate and specific areas within the groups. Merchant group focuses on making Wolt an integral part of our Merchants’ daily lives in all the 23 countries Wolt is active in.The current teams in the Merchant Group are:Merchant App - Team owns the Merchant Application - the main Wolt operating tool for the venues. Around 50 000 iPads are alive and about at the moment in 23 different countries.Merchant Tools - The team owns various parts of the Merchant lifecycle (such as the onboarding experience) and internal + external tools.Restaurant Menu - The team focuses on creating a great experience for managing menus with the Menu Editor. Changes in the editor can be directly seen in the experience on the consumer side.Merchant Integrations - The team helps merchants scale their operations on Wolt by providing self-service tools to automate manual tasks.When you apply we will consider you for all the teams, but feel free to specify if there is some team that especially interests you based on these short descriptions.All in all, you'd be part of a team that improves the Wolt experience by helping our merchants serve more customers faster while enabling them to focus on things that are the most important. If that's something that gets you excited, don't hesitate to drop in your application.Cool stuff about our teams:Ownership: We handle the whole development process (business logic, testing, database & data streaming, CI/CD, analytics, cloud) ourselves in an autonomous manner. Don’t worry, we’re not alone: We have support from central teams when we need help.Technology: We use modern tools and technologies. Current stack in use: Kotlin, Python, React + Typescript, MongoDB, Kafka, GitHub Actions, Jenkins, Terraform, AWS, Docker and Kubernetes.Autonomy: We make the decisions as a team. We are free to choose the technology stack and tools and make architectural decisions as a team. Team leads are there to serve the teams and be the best they can be. No top-down decisions!Growth: There is a lot of room for learning, teaching and growing together. We will support you with the tools and materials you need.Creativity: We’re building something new with minimal technical debt so you can focus on developing new features.Flexibility: You can choose whether you want to work fully remote, from the office or hybrid. It’s up to you and we don’t monitor people. We have a dedicated relocation partner to help you move to either Finland or Germany. If you are currently living in Estonia, Denmark or Sweden there is no need for you to relocate should you want to work from home but we will help you if you do want to move.Diversity: We have different people with different backgrounds. Cultivating diversity and maintaining different opinions is the key to our success.Our humble expectationsHands-on: We are looking for people who have several years of experience building high-quality software. This can include working with Apps, APIs and integrations, handling the whole development cycle all the way to production. Having said that, seniority at Wolt is measured by skills, not the number of years on your CV.Skilled: We want you to be proficient with React + Typescript. Several years of professional experience is preferred.Communicator & collaborator: We work closely with our teammates and having a good connection with team members is essential. We understand that everyone has their own unique way of communicating with others. We expect you to be yourself, express your opinions, and work together with the rest of the team.Next StepsJoin us for an exciting journey! If you find the role interesting, we'd love to receive your application!In case you want to check up on your application or have any further questions about the position, you can turn to Talent Acquisition Partner Salem Mansuri on salem.mansuri@external.wolt.com at any given time.About WoltWolt is a technology company that makes it incredibly easy to discover and get the best restaurants, grocery stores and other local shops delivered to your home or office. Wolt is not just a delivery app – we’re a technology company building a commerce platform to seamlessly connect our millions of customers with thousands of merchant and courier partners, in real-time across 23 countries and 250+ cities. Our apps (iOS and Android) have the industry’s highest ratings, largely thanks to our customer-first-mindset, which shows in how we build products and run operations. In June 2022 we officially joined forces with DoorDash. Combined, we have a presence in 27 countries, 23 of which operate with the Wolt brand and app. Wolt and DoorDash continue largely independently, with Wolt’s name, brand, product, technology and team.Working in Product Development at WoltAt Wolt, we’re about getting things done. You’ll probably enjoy it here if you like taking ownership, developing yourself and being around friendly, humble and ambitious people.The behind the scenes of Wolt is run by an awesome bunch of over 400+ planners, builders, designers and data crunchers. We call ourselves Product+, as we’re the very core of Wolt’s products, tools and platforms. To build our products, we work in over 40 cross-functional, independent and autonomous teams. Teams are made up of a mix of talented individuals: engineers, designers, data scientists, analysts, and product leads. Each team takes ownership for solving customer problems in the best possible way.Our Commitment to Diversity, Equity & InclusionWe want to have all sorts of people in our team – people like you and me, and people different from you and me. To be able to work with diverse teammates – when it comes to gender, age, ethnicity, life background, sexual orientation, political views, religion, or any other personal trait – we consciously aim to offer equal opportunity for everyone to work with us. This is because we believe diverse teams make the most thought-through decisions and build things in the most inclusive way.Join us today to build Wolt together!

Job DescriptionAt the fast growing scale of the Wolt business our operational efficiency benefits greatly from having automation for managing supply (how many courier partners are online) and demand (how many orders are being placed by customers). For us it’s a clear win-win situation, but it takes an entire team to make sure that this is possible. 💪 So, in order to achieve our mission to build the best tools for keeping the fine balance between planning and forecasting of delivery services at any given time and place, we decided to strengthen our ranks by adding one more Backend Engineer to our teams in the Courier Group to balance out our own team needs!You will be working with frontend engineers, UX designers, backend engineers, and data scientists, and right now we’re building our supply and demand forecasting systems of the future, but we need your help in doing so! So, if you’re an experienced Python charmer with a background in machine learning or similar field, an interest in tackling scalability challenges, and building some real cool stuff, then be sure to drop us a line. 🐍 Also, you’ll get a chance to work closely together with our brilliant Data Scientists (seriously, this is a great chance to learn a lot about data science if you have a knack for it)!Still not sure? As a backend engineer, you will have a big impact on the team and you will be a key player in building a new platform that will help us create reliable forecasts which consume large amounts of operator sourced data where operators can input and alter planning data and can trigger model runs based on their inputs. You’ll also work on designing and implementing APIs, helping data scientists integrate their new ML-based models, as well as setting up data pipelines between our backend and data warehouse, so there’s quite a lot of exciting things going on!📍These roles can be based in one of our tech hubs in Helsinki, Berlin or Stockholm, or you can work remotely anywhere in Finland, Germany or Sweden. Read more about our remote setup 👉 here.Our humble expectations👉 You have fluent programing skills using modern Python, have experience setting up backend microservices, and building solid scalable services and well-structured applications using it.👉 You preferably have experience working with machine learning or similar computational methods👉 You have experience working with Docker and Kubernetes for containerization and orchestration as well as familiarity with database technologies, such as PostgreSQL.👉 You have an analytical and curious way of thinking and are comfortable working with real-world data and its different nuances👉 Since the backend has mostly been written in Python (ofc) and Scala, if you have previous experience and willingness to tinker in the backend with Scala - even better, we consider that a plus!👉 Most importantly, you’re a dedicated person who is pragmatic with a positive attitude, who doesn't shy away from going outside of their comfort zone, and demonstrates curiosity and willingness to keep continuously learning.Next StepsThe position will be filled as soon as we find the right person, so make sure to apply as soon as you realize you really, really want to join us!💯 Overall our product organization consists of a team of over 500 people at Wolt. We aim to build none other than the best-in-the-world engineering team here.💙 You’ll get to work in a company culture where we take ownership beyond the obvious, do common things uncommonly well, we think big but stay humble, do right by people, we treat others kindly and justly, recognise that if we don’t learn, we won’t stay still but fall behind, and keep in mind that Luke was Yoda’s greatest achievement.🙌 Join us for an exciting journey! The compensation will be a negotiable combination of monthly pay and DoorDash equity. The latter makes it exceptionally easy to be excited about our company growing and doing well, as you’ll own a piece of the pie.For any further questions about the position, you can turn to Product+ Talent Acquisition Partner - Lina Muncyte (lina.muncyte(at)wolt.com).About WoltWolt is a technology company that makes it incredibly easy to discover and get the best restaurants, grocery stores and other local shops delivered to your home or office. Wolt is not just a delivery app – we’re a technology company building a commerce platform to seamlessly connect our millions of customers with thousands of merchant and courier partners, in real-time across 23 countries and 250+ cities. Our apps (iOS and Android) have the industry’s highest ratings, largely thanks to our customer-first-mindset, which shows in how we build products and run operations. In June 2022 we officially joined forces with DoorDash. Combined, we have a presence in 27 countries, 23 of which operate with the Wolt brand and app. Wolt and DoorDash continue largely independently, with Wolt’s name, brand, product, technology and team.Working in Product Development at WoltAt Wolt, we’re about getting things done. We call ourselves Product+, as we’re the very core of Wolt’s products, tools and platforms. To build our products, we work in over 40 cross-functional, independent and autonomous teams. Teams are made up of a mix of talented individuals: engineers, designers, data scientists, analysts, and product leads. Each team takes ownership for solving customer problems in the best possible way.Our Commitment to Diversity, Equity & InclusionWe want to have all sorts of people in our team – people like you and me, and people different from you and me. To be able to work with diverse teammates – when it comes to gender, age, ethnicity, life background, sexual orientation, political views, religion, or any other personal trait – we consciously aim to offer equal opportunity for everyone to work with us. This is because we believe diverse teams make the most thought-through decisions and build things in the most inclusive way.Join us today to build Wolt together!_1

Job DescriptionAre you an experienced finance professional with a solid background in designing and managing finance processes in a complex, fast-moving environment? Does playing a key role in shaping financial processes in a global tech company sound like your ideal next opportunity? If so, we would love to hear from you!Role BackgroundWolt Finance and especially the Record to Report area is going through changes from outsourced model to internal financial services. We are on our way of creating a world-class financial team with ambition to streamline processes, unify our accounting practices and increase automation level at the same time with rapid company growth. The Process Specialist is taking responsibility for these endeavors together with the Process Owner, other finance teams, product teams and external service providers.Sounds simple, right?While the role is key to enable our continued success, and the challenge great, fear not - as you'll not be alone for the ride. In this role, you will work closely with development-oriented finance- and operations experts as well as highly skilled product engineers to make sure we design our processes in ways that are both efficient and scalable. The environment is complex and challenging, but you will enjoy the thrill of nurturing your own thoughts and ideas into reality, while enjoying the support of our experienced professionals across various teams.This is an exciting opportunity to develop finance process practices in one of Europe's fastest growing tech companies. If you feel like the role matches your experience and you're ready for the next challenge, read on and apply - we're looking forward to meeting you!What You’ll Be DoingParticipate and lead the selected Record to Report process improvement initiativesUse in-depth accounting and process knowledge to drive process harmonization to all Wolt entitiesIdentify automation needs and drive through automation / system improvements for the Record to Report processesProactively interact with various finance teams, product owners and engineering teams to make sure we are progressing with agreed development actionsIdentify system enhancements needs, act as one of the key users for the ERP and/or any other Record to Report owned systemsDrive efficient deployment of new processes with strong on-boarding and training programs for RTR end usersMaintain RTR process related documentation Our humble expectationsSolid background in harmonizing accounting processes and implementation of end to end processes. Ideally, you’ll have prior experiences (being part / implementation of harmonization projects) from a similar position in a multinational organizationHighly passionate about translating finance requirements into concrete Accounting process / system requirements Proactive in seeking out improvement opportunities and driving collaboration across stakeholder groupProject management experienceStrong plus having experience in a high-paced startup environmentStrong communication skills and interpersonal skillsComfortable working fully in EnglishNext StepsNext stepsIf you are excited about working in a high-growth environment, taking ownership of things you care about, and being part of an ambitious group of professionals, then click below to apply and get the conversation going!Along with a competitive salary and benefits, you will also be eligible for our stock option plan.You will fit into a truly diverse team across 23 countries - what really matters to us is a caring and welcoming environment where we embrace uniqueness and celebrate diversity. Experience a company culture where we work on eye level, decisions are made quickly and knowledge sharing, as well as mentoring, is on our daily agenda.If you have any further questions about the position, you can turn to:Kalle Sundell, Talent Acqusition Partner at kalle.sundell@wolt.comPlease note that we do not accept applications sent by mail. You should submit your application through our careers website!About WoltAbout Wolt Wolt is a technology company that makes it incredibly easy to discover and get the best restaurants, grocery stores and other local shops delivered to home or to the office. Our local commerce platform makes it easy for customers to order whatever they need on one app, for merchants to make additional sales, and for couriers to make meaningful earnings flexibly. To enable this, Wolt develops a wide range of technologies from local commerce platform to retail software and financial solutions, as well as operates its own grocery stores under the brand Wolt Market. Wolt was founded in 2014 and joined forces with DoorDash in 2022. DoorDash operates in 27 countries today, 23 of which are with the Wolt product and brand. So, why work at Wolt?At Wolt, We’re About Getting Things Done.You’ll probably enjoy it here if you like taking ownership, developing yourself and being around friendly, humble and ambitious people.We work hard to make cities into better places, and it’s pretty cool seeing us grow every week. If you’re passionate about building things that just… work, Wolt might be for you.Our Commitment to Diversity, Equity & InclusionWe want to have all sorts of people in our team – people like you and me, and people different from you and me. To be able to work with diverse teammates – when it comes to gender, age, ethnicity, life background, sexual orientation, political views, religion, or any other personal trait – we consciously aim to offer equal opportunity for everyone to work with us. This is because we believe diverse teams make the most thought-through decisions and build things in the most inclusive way.Join us today to build Wolt together.

AI for People defines what Silo AI stands for. We want to build a world with safe human-centric AI that frees the human mind from manual labour and empowers human creativity. We are looking experienced software developers interested in implementing production-grade AI solutions.As a Software Developer you will be working on creating solutions for our clients as well as as a part of Silo AI's internal product R&D team. You will e.g. design and develop data-heavy, secure, and reliable web-based applications and backend services for cloud and edge environments. You will design and implement tools and applications that change the way we build and run our AI solutions and how we fit them to broader software systems. You will take care of packaging, testing, deploying, and supporting the software you deliver.Examples of our current tech stack and tools consist of for example Python, Node.js, Vue.js, React, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Tensorflow, Keras, PyTorch, Google Cloud, Kubernetes, Jenkins, Bitbucket. Read more about our cases that we have made for Infranode in automated lead generation and Philips in radiotherapy planning.Meet the teamYou will be working closely with our AI Scientists, experienced Software Developers and AI Architects while building our new products. Get to know some of your future colleagues: Lead AI Solutions Architect Niko, Senior Software Developer Kimmo and AI Scientist Luiza.What we valueStrong experience with our key technologies, including Python and preferably Vue.jsExperience in designing and building cloud-deployed web-based applications and data-heavy backend servicesInitiative, pragmatic problem solving, and great communication skillsDesire and ability to quickly acquire broad high-level intuition of AI systems and solutionsExperience in devops, AI systems and frameworks, scientific Python stack, edge deployments, and infrastructure automation is a big plusWhat Silo offers for you?As we already know, AI will be affecting almost everyone's work and everyday life. With us you have a real chance of shaping the change that AI will bring to everyone of us. You will get to choose your tools, methods, and ways of working together with the R&D team while ramping it up. The products you develop will have a key role in expanding and accelerating the use of AI in large scale real world applications. Your closest colleagues will be an AI enthusiast mix of model developers and software experts working in the AI areas of computer vision, machine learning, and natural language processing. We aim for excellence by keep learning from the market, sharing our competence and looking for a growth mindset. We will help your learning for example through our Learning Labs and Talent CoachingInterested in joining us?Send your application from the "apply" button and tell us why you are interested in the Software Developer role at Silo AI and what you are passionate about, along with relevant profiles (CV/LinkedIn/Github).

At Silo AI engineers and researchers collaborate closely to tackle challenging real-world problems. The core competence of Silo AI relies on deep academic, and industry expertise in various fields of AI, covering machine learning, natural-language processing, computer vision among others. AI Engineers are expected to build innovative AI solutions powered by, and powering, Large Language Models (LLMs) that together with AI Scientists and software developers can be deployed in our products serving our clients.What will you be doingAs an AI Engineer in Large Language Models, you'll work in a top tier team of AI experts, creating next-generation methods for creating safe, reliable and robust AI models. You'll closely collaborate in a team with scientists and product developers to implement our vision of human-centric AI and specifically, LLMs. You may choose to work from our offices in Helsinki or Stockholm, whichever suits you best.AI Engineers are expected to have strong industry experience and projects showing clear evidence of high-quality software engineering in fields related to AI and proven experience and ability to implement solutions in high-performance computing environments. As an AI Engineer you will:Train, fine-tune and evaluate state-of-the-art transformer modelsCreate workflows and tools for fine-tuning language models Implement model parallelism and data parallelism techniques to optimize model performance through model and data parallelismCollaborate with cross-functional teams to create value with LLMs. Implement tooling to support reinforcement learning human feedback methodsWork with Python, SQL, C++ and Linux systems to develop robust data solutions. Requirements:MSc or PhD in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, or a related field. 6+ years of experience in the industry, on topics such as Artificial Intelligence, high-performance computing and Machine LearningPrevious expertise and interest in Natural Language Processing and large language models or Reinforcement Learning. Proficiency in Python, C++ and SQLExperience in utilizing GPUs or TPUs training transformer-based modelsExperience in high-performance computingWorking proficiency in EnglishOur cultureWhat we believe in at Silo AIBuild Bonds - Trust is our bond. We connect with customers and always seek to understand how we can best help them, and make sure that we keep what we promise. We encourage a culture where successes are celebrated, learnings shared and support provided for our team members to succeed. Keep Learning - Grow to excel. We aim for excellence by learning from the market, sharing our competence, and attracting talent with a growth mindset. We believe that expertise is not an achievement - it's a lifestyle of curiosity, learning, sharing and working with people who share the same hunger. Ask Why - Know your why. We have the courage and agility to keep challenging what we're doing to assure value creation for customers. We encourage open dialogue and debate and strive for diversity in opinions to improve decision making. Be Good - Positive impact. We always strive to be transparent and open in our communications, take ownership and aim for positive impact and results in all we do. We take pride in creating an equal and supportive workplace for talented and ambitious professionals from all nationalities, genders, orientations and

AI Engineers are expected to build innovative AI solutions powered by, and powering, Large Language Models (LLMs) that together with AI Scientists and software developers can be deployed in our products serving our clients.What will you be doingAs an AI Engineer in Large Language Models, you'll work in a top tier team of AI experts, creating next-generation methods for creating safe, reliable and robust AI models. You'll closely collaborate in a team with scientists and product developers to implement our vision of human-centric AI and specifically, LLMs. You may choose to work from our offices in Helsinki or Stockholm, whichever suits you best.AI Engineers are expected to have strong industry experience and projects showing clear evidence of high-quality software engineering in fields related to AI and proven experience and ability to implement solutions in high-performance computing environments. As an AI Engineer you will:Train, fine-tune and evaluate state-of-the-art transformer modelsCreate workflows and tools for fine-tuning language models Implement model parallelism and data parallelism techniques to optimize model performance through model and data parallelismCollaborate with cross-functional teams to create value with LLMs. Implement tooling to support reinforcement learning human feedback methodsWork with Python, SQL, C++ and Linux systems to develop robust data solutions. Requirements:MSc or PhD in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, or a related field. 6+ years of experience in the industry, on topics such as Artificial Intelligence, high-performance computing and Machine LearningPrevious expertise and interest in Natural Language Processing and large language models or Reinforcement Learning. Proficiency in Python, C++ and SQLExperience in utilizing GPUs or TPUs training transformer-based modelsExperience in high-performance computingWorking proficiency in EnglishOur cultureWhat we believe in at Silo AIBuild Bonds - Trust is our bond. We connect with customers and always seek to understand how we can best help them, and make sure that we keep what we promise. We encourage a culture where successes are celebrated, learnings shared and support provided for our team members to succeed. Keep Learning - Grow to excel. We aim for excellence by learning from the market, sharing our competence, and attracting talent with a growth mindset. We believe that expertise is not an achievement - it's a lifestyle of curiosity, learning, sharing and working with people who share the same hunger. Ask Why - Know your why. We have the courage and agility to keep challenging what we're doing to assure value creation for customers. We encourage open dialogue and debate and strive for diversity in opinions to improve decision making. Be Good - Positive impact. We always strive to be transparent and open in our communications, take ownership and aim for positive impact and results in all we do. We take pride in creating an equal and supportive workplace for talented and ambitious professionals from all nationalities, genders, orientations and

AI for People defines what Silo AI stands for. We want to build a world with safe human-centric AI that frees the human mind from manual labour and empowers human creativity. We are looking experienced software developers interested in implementing production-grade AI solutions.As a Full Stack Software Developer you will be working on creating solutions and products for our clients. You will e.g. design and develop secure, and reliable web-based UI's and backend services for Machine Learning solutions. You will design and implement tools and applications that change the way we build and run our AI solutions and how we fit them into broader software systems. You will take care of packaging, testing, deploying, and supporting the software you deliver.Our current tech stack and tools consist of for example Python, Vue.js, React, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Jenkins, and Kubernetes across private and public clouds Azure, AWS, and GCP. Read more about our cases that we have made for Infranode in automated lead generation and Philips in radiotherapy planning.What we valueStrong experience with our key technologies, including Python and preferably Vue.jsExperience in designing and building cloud-deployed web-based applications and data-heavy backend servicesInitiative, pragmatic problem solving, and great communication skillsDesire and ability to quickly acquire broad high-level intuition of AI systems and solutionsExperience in devops, AI systems and frameworks, scientific Python stack, edge deployments, and infrastructure automation is a big plusWhat Silo offers for you?As we already know, AI will be affecting almost everyone's work and everyday life. With us you have a real chance of shaping the change that AI will bring to everyone of us. You will get to choose your tools, methods, and ways of working together with the team while ramping it up. The products you develop will have a key role in expanding and accelerating the use of AI in large scale real world applications. Your closest colleagues will be an AI enthusiast mix of model developers and software experts working in the AI areas of computer vision, machine learning, and natural language processing. We aim for excellence by keep learning from the market, sharing our competence and looking for a growth mindset. We will help your learning for example through our Learning Labs and Talent CoachingInterested in joining us?Send your application and tell us why you are interested in the Software Developer role at Silo AI and what you are passionate about, along with relevant profiles (CV/LinkedIn/Github).

At Silo AI our team of 200+ AI Engineers, AI Scientists, Solutions Architects, Software Developers, and Designers collaborate closely to tackle challenging real-world problems related to AI. Now we are looking for AI Engineers to build MLOps solutions for quality ML development and scalable AI utilizations in multi-cloud environments. The work is done as part of our Helsinki, Tampere, Turku, Jyväskylä, Oulu, Stockholm or Copenhagen teams.What Will You Be DoingBuilding versatile ML development and AI deployment setups (pipelines and/or platforms) and other MLOps solutions to enable production-level AI and ML in multi-cloud environments and sometimes in connection to IoT and embedded settingsWork very practically hand-on but also designing the needed architectures and workflows - enabled by Silo AI assets and learning from versatile project casesWork as part of the team with leading AI experts and use cutting edge tools to train, deploy and service advanced machine learning models Working in client projects in various different industries that typically lasts 3-6 months, but we also work in long-term projects lasting 1-2 years Contributing to Cloud AI & MLOps community and R&D work of Silo AIWhat We Are Looking For From YouYou have strong experience in software development Experience in training, versioning, deploying, monitoring and/or maintaining machine learning modelsYou have knowledge of cloud platforms and technologies (e.g. Kubernetes, Azure, AWS and/or Google Cloud)You are experienced in programming with Python and can adopt other programming languages. You are familiar with some typical MLOps tools, such as KubeFlow, MLFlow, KFServing/KServe, Seldon, Airflow, Argo, Prefect or others; some DevOps tooling such as Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform scripting (or CloudFormation or similar); some machine learning frameworks, such as Tensorflow and/or PyTorch; some logging tools, such as ElasticStack, Grafana, Prometheus and/or othersYou have a track record of producing quality code and developing software with different practices (CI/CD, version control, some variety of agile development)You may have also DataOps related experience around storage (SQL, NoSQL, cloud), processing (batch, stream, ETL), managing/versioning, security, visualization and/or big dataYou are interested in working and communicating with Silo AI clients and working part of the team with Silo experts Be able to learn new skills and adapt quickly, as the problems, tools, best practices, and architectures are rapidly changing. What Silo Ai Offers To YouReal-world and production-level projects related to AI in various different industries such as retail, manufacturing, machine industry, automotive, pharma, telecom, smart devices, medical, energy & infra, logistics, healthcare, and internet services High-level & diverse tech and non-tech expertise around you as peers with our team of 200+ employees and 20+ nationalities Cloud AI & MLOps community which includes 30+ experts and a lot of information sharing and learning resources - and our other three technology areas include IoT, Embedded and Connectivity which bring their own additions to the MLOps work Learning culture with several different learning activities to support your learning such as 1-1 talent coaching with lead level experts, self-development benefit, company-wide workshops, internal research club bi-weekly basis Silo social activities like daily meditation, virtual lunches, and company-wide all-hands every Friday, company supported Silo social activities Growth company environment - in 2021 we have hired around 100 new employees and opened up a new office in Copenhagen, Denmark. In 2022 we are looking for hiring even more employees than in 2021 and opening up new countries in addition to the three current ones. Possibility to become Silo shareholderNormal benefits such as work equipment of own choice, occupational healthcare, sports & culture vouchers, internet, lunch through Wolt on Fridays, self-development budgetOUR CULTUREWhat we believe in at SiloBuild bonds - Trust is our bond. We connect with customers and seek to understand how we can best help, and always keep what we promise. We encourage a culture in which successes are celebrated, learnings shared and support provided for our team members to succeed. Be good - Positive impact. We strive to be transparent and open, take responsibility and ownership, and aim for positive impact and results in all we do. We take pride in creating an equal and supportive workplace for talented and ambitious professionals from all nationalities, genders, and backgrounds. Ask why - Know your why. We have the courage and agility to keep challenging what we're doing to assure value creation for customers. We encourage open dialogue and debate and strive for diversity in opinions to improve decision making. Keep learning - Grow to excel. We aim for excellence by learning from the market, sharing our competence, and recruiting a growth mindset. For us expertise is not an achievement, it's a lifestyle of curiosity, learning, sharing, and working with people who share the same hunger. WANT TO KNOW MORE?You can ask more about Silo AI as a workplace from our Talent Acquisition Lead Emmi Matvejeff, emmi.matvejeff@silo.ai

Position DescriptionMeillä on kokoisesi paikka auki – Tule luomaan oman näköistä urapolkuasi meille!CGI:llä pääset osaksi yhtä maailman suurimmista IT-taloista. Meillä saat rakentaa toimivia ratkaisuja, joilla on aito vaikutus suomalaisten elämän sujuvuuteen ja helppouteen. Tutustu tästä esimerkkeihin kehittämistämme ratkaisuista: HSL-reittiopas ohjaa matkustajia joukkoliikenteessä Pentikin kassajärjestelmä varmistaa sujuvan asioinnin Spoofy-mobiilipelin avulla alakoululaiset oppivat kybertaitoja HUS:ille algoritmin aivoverenvuotojen tunnistamiseen Postin palvelukeskus kehittyy ohjelmistorobotiikan voimin Matkahuollon uudistunut verkkopalvelu vie paremmin perille SOK löytää parhaat kauppapaikat paikkatiedon avulla Pilvipohjainen Lemmikkihelppi toimii Lähitapiolan etäeläinlääkärisovelluksena Hävikkimestari minimoi ruokahävikkiä varuskunnissa Festarifiilistä Sideways-sovelluksen avulla Potilasruokailun digitalisoinnilla rakennetaan asiakaskokemusta Mobilog toiminnanohjausratkaisun avulla tehostetaan työprosessin kulkuaTarjoamme sinulleMielenkiintoisten tehtävien lisäksi tilaisuuden kehittyä ja kasvaa haluamaasi suuntaan. Olemme vankka ja vakavarainen työnantaja, jossa voit rakentaa omannäköisesi urapolun.Tarjoamme henkilöstöllemme kattavat edut osakeosto-ohjelmasta työsuhdepolkupyörään. Tutustu meihin ja kaikkiin tarjoamiimme etuihin CGI:n henkilöstölle räätälöidystä työehtosopimuksesta. Yhteisiä mielenkiinnon kohteita voit jakaa esimerkiksi e-urheilun, tech-asiantuntijuuden, urheilun tai vapaa-ajan viettoon keskittyvien yhteisöjemme kautta. Millaista on työskennellä kansainvälisessä IT-talossa?Toteutamme asiakkaillemme liiketoiminnan digitalisoinnin lisäksi monipuolisia IT-palveluita sekä innovatiivisia ohjelmistoratkaisuja, ketteriä menetelmiä hyödyntäen. Asiakkainamme ovat niin pankki-, vakuutus-, teollisuus- sekä kaupan alan toimijoita, muutamia mainitaksemme.Käyttämiämme teknologioita ovat muun muassa:Java, Node.js, Go, React, Angular, JavaScript, TypeScript, Vue.js, Kotlin, AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, API/REST.Toivomme, että sinulla olisi ohjelmointikokemusta vähintään 1-2 vuoden ajalta, mutta etsimme joukkoomme myös kokeneempiakin kehittäjiä. Tehtävän sisältöä ja vaativuutta on mahdollista sovittaa kiinnostuksesi ja osaamisesi mukaan. Lisäksi eduksi on, mikäli sinulla on osaamista tai kiinnostusta pilviteknologioihin sekä tietokanta- ja integraatio-osaamista.Omalla urapolullasiMeille on tärkeää, että saat olla työpaikalla oma itsesi. Kun kaipaat vaihtelua, voit ottaa haltuun uuden teknologian, toimialan tai asiakkuuden – ja kun kaipaat työltä joustoa uudessa elämäntilanteessa, sekin järjestyy.Kutsumme henkilöstöämme membereiksi, sillä yli 80 prosenttia membereistämme on myös omistajia. Halutessasi sinäkin voit sijoittaa yhtiön osakkeisiin, jolloin CGI tuplaa sijoittamasi summan. Lisäksi jokainen member voi käyttää työaikaansa myös hyväntekeväisyyteen.Kiinnostuitko?Mikäli innostuit lukemastasi ja monimuotoisessa porukassa tekeminen motivoi, voit olla etsimämme osaaja. Kerro meille, millaisten projektien parissa olet aiemmin työskennellyt ja mitä tahtoisit tehdä seuraavaksi.Haethan meille rekrytointijärjestelmämme kautta osoitteessa www.cgi.fi/ura. Olemme sinuun yhteydessä, mikäli löydämme sinulle sopivia mahdollisuuksia!Tutustu meihin lisää: Facebook Instagram LinkedIn Twitter YouTubeYour future duties and responsibilitiesRequired Qualifications To Be Successful In This RoleInsights you can act onWhile technology is at the heart of our clients’ digital transformation, we understand that people are at the heart of business success.When you join CGI, you become a trusted advisor, collaborating with colleagues and clients to bring forward actionable insights that deliver meaningful and sustainable outcomes. We call our employees “members” because they are CGI shareholders and owners, and, as owners, we enjoy working and growing together to build a company we are proud of. This has been our Dream since 1976, and it has brought us to where we are today—one of the world’s largest independent providers of IT and business consulting services.At CGI, we recognize the richness that diversity brings. We strive to create a work culture where everyone belongs, and we collaborate with clients in building more inclusive communities. As an equal opportunity employer, we empower all our members to succeed and grow. If you require an accommodation at any point during the recruitment process, please let us know. We will be happy to assist.Ready to become part of our success story? Join CGI—where your ideas and actions make a difference.

Position DescriptionVuonna 1976 perustettu CGI on maailman ja Suomen suurimpia IT- ja liiketoimintakonsultoinnin palveluyhtiöitä – ja tuhansien erilaisten uratarinoiden talo. Lisätietoa www.cgi.fi.Solution Architect, BankingHaemme tiimiimme ratkaisuarkkitehtiä (Solution Architect) monipuolisiin tehtäviin pankkialan asiakkuuteemme.Tässä tehtävässäToimit asiakkaamme järjestelmäkokonaisuuksien suunnittelun, ylläpidon ja kehittämisen parissa ja teet yhteistyötä proaktiivisesti sekä asiakkaan, kolmansien osapuolien että CGI:n tiimin kanssa.Olet kokenut arkkitehti/senior kehittäjä. Sinulla on kokemusta tuotantoympäristöjen ja tuotantosovellusten hallinnasta ja pystyt kannattelemaan laajojakin järjestelmäkokonaisuuksia. Sinulla on kyvykkyys suunnitella, tuottaa ja kuvata ratkaisuja asiakkaamme tarpeisiin. Haluat myös itse osallistua sovellusten ja palveluiden kehitystyöhön hyödyntäen osaamistasi.Vahvuuksiasi ovat Kyky toimia sekä teknisessä että liiketoimintarajapinnassa Visualisointi- ja mallintamistaidot prosessi- ja sovellustasolla Kyky tunnistaa riippuvuuksia ja keskeisiä vaikutuksia laajoissa järjestelmäympäristössä Kyky analysoida ja suunnitella kokonaisuuksia eheän arkkitehtuurin ja hyvän tietoturvan saavuttamiseksi Hyvät yhteistyö- ja vuorovaikutustaidot suomeksi ja englanniksiSinulta löytyy osaamista seuraavista: Windows-palvelinympäristö Tuotantoympäristöjen ja -sovellusten hallinta Integraatioiden suunnittelu, REST/SOAP-integraatiot C#/.NET Powershell Pankkitoimialan/lainaamisen toimialan tuntemus on tehtävässä eduksiÄlä huoli, mikäli kaikki kriteerit eivät täyty, sillä arvostamme ennen kaikkea myös positiivista, oppimishaluista ja ratkaisukeskeistä asennetta sekä aktiivista otetta työntekoon.Meillä CGI:llä…… olet member.Tarjoamme sinulle paitsi työn, jossa voit kehittyä haluamaasi suuntaan, myös mahdollisuuden omistaa yhtiön osakkeita. Koska yli 80 prosenttia henkilöstöstämme on myös omistajia, kutsumme henkilöstöämme membereiksi. Membereinä pääsemme nauttimaan CGI:n taloudellisesta menestyksestä ja rakentamaan toiveidemme mukaista yhtiötä.… saat olla sellainen kuin olet.Meitä on 3 700 ympäri Suomen ja meille on tärkeää, että jokainen meistä saa olla työpaikalla oma itsensä. Monimuotoiset tiimimme määrittelevät itse, millaiset joustavat työnteon tavat niille parhaiten sopivat. Meillä työ myös joustaa, kun elämäntilanne sitä vaatii.… sinusta pidetään huolta.Meille CGI:n membereille on tärkeää, että tuemme ja autamme aina toisiamme. Et ole koskaan yksin: tuhansista huippuasiantuntijoistamme löytyy aina joku, johon tukeutua. Ja tarjoamme tietysti myös laajan valikoiman henkilöstöetuja, jotka auttavat sinua voimaan paremmin.… innostut työstäsi – yhä uudelleen.Meillä viihdytään pitkään, koska kokoisessamme talossa on tarjolla aina uusia uramahdollisuuksia ja niihin siirtyminen on tehty helpoksi. Kun kaipaat vaihtelua, voit ottaa haltuun uuden teknologian, toimialan tai asiakkuuden – ja kun kaipaat työltä joustoa uudessa elämäntilanteessa, sekin järjestyy. Tule meille rakentamaan itsesi näköinen ura!Kiinnostuitko?Hienoa! Seuraavaksi kuulisimme mielellämme lisää sinusta.Haethan tehtävää rekrytointijärjestelmämme kautta osoitteessa www.cgi.fi/ura.Viimeinen hakupäivä on 28.5.2023.
